102  public static function get_forms( $is_active = null, $sort_column = 'title', $sort_dir = 'ASC', $is_trash = false ) {
103  global $wpdb;
104  $form_table_name = self::get_form_table_name();
105  $lead_table_name = self::get_lead_table_name();
106  $lead_detail_table_name = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
107  $view_table_name = self::get_form_view_table_name();
108 
109  $where_arr = array();
110  $where_arr[] = $wpdb->prepare( 'is_trash=%d', $is_trash );
111  if ( $is_active !== null ) {
112  $where_arr[] = $wpdb->prepare( 'is_active=%d', $is_active );
113  }
114 
115  $where_clause = 'WHERE ' . join( ' AND ', $where_arr );
116  $sort_keyword = $sort_dir == 'ASC' ? 'ASC' : 'DESC';
117 
118  $db_columns = self::get_form_db_columns();
119 
120  if ( ! in_array( strtolower( $sort_column ), $db_columns ) ) {
121  $sort_column = 'title';
122  }
123 
124  $order_by = ! empty( $sort_column ) ? "ORDER BY $sort_column $sort_keyword" : '';
125 
126  $sql = "SELECT f.id, f.title, f.date_created, f.is_active, 0 as lead_count, 0 view_count
127  FROM $form_table_name f
128  $where_clause
129  $order_by";
130 
131  //Getting all forms
132  $forms = $wpdb->get_results( $sql );
133 
134  //Getting entry count per form
135  $sql = "SELECT l.form_id, count(DISTINCT(l.id)) as lead_count FROM $lead_table_name l INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name ld ON l.id=ld.lead_id WHERE l.status='active' GROUP BY l.form_id";
136  $entry_count = $wpdb->get_results( $sql );
137 
138  //Getting view count per form
139  $sql = "SELECT form_id, sum(count) as view_count FROM $view_table_name GROUP BY form_id";
140  $view_count = $wpdb->get_results( $sql );
141 
142  //Adding entry counts and to form array
143  foreach ( $forms as &$form ) {
144  foreach ( $view_count as $count ) {
145  if ( $count->form_id == $form->id ) {
146  $form->view_count = $count->view_count;
147  break;
148  }
149  }
150 
151  foreach ( $entry_count as $count ) {
152  if ( $count->form_id == $form->id ) {
153  $form->lead_count = $count->lead_count;
154  break;
155  }
156  }
157  }
158 
159  return $forms;
160  }

172  public static function get_form_payment_totals( $form_id ) {

175 
176  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
177  " SELECT sum(payment_amount) revenue, count(l.id) orders
178  FROM $lead_table_name l
179  WHERE form_id=%d AND payment_amount IS NOT null", $form_id
180  );
181 
182  $totals = $wpdb->get_row( $sql, ARRAY_A );
183 
184  $active = $wpdb->get_var(
185  $wpdb->prepare(
186  " SELECT count(id) as active
187  FROM $lead_table_name
188  WHERE form_id=%d AND payment_status='Active'", $form_id
189  )
190  );
191

193  $active = 0;
194  }
195

201  public static function get_form_counts( $form_id ) {
202  global $wpdb;
203  $lead_table_name = self::get_lead_table_name();
204  $lead_detail_table_name = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
205 
206  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
207  "SELECT
208  (SELECT count(DISTINCT(l.id)) FROM $lead_table_name l INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name ld ON l.id=ld.lead_id WHERE l.form_id=%d AND l.status='active') as total,
209  (SELECT count(DISTINCT(l.id)) FROM $lead_table_name l INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name ld ON l.id=ld.lead_id WHERE l.is_read=0 AND l.status='active' AND l.form_id=%d) as unread,
210  (SELECT count(DISTINCT(l.id)) FROM $lead_table_name l INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name ld ON l.id=ld.lead_id WHERE l.is_starred=1 AND l.status='active' AND l.form_id=%d) as starred,
211  (SELECT count(DISTINCT(l.id)) FROM $lead_table_name l INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name ld ON l.id=ld.lead_id WHERE l.status='spam' AND l.form_id=%d) as spam,
212  (SELECT count(DISTINCT(l.id)) FROM $lead_table_name l INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name ld ON l.id=ld.lead_id WHERE l.status='trash' AND l.form_id=%d) as trash",
213  $form_id, $form_id, $form_id, $form_id, $form_id
214  );
215 
216  $results = $wpdb->get_results( $sql, ARRAY_A );
217 
218  return $results[0];
219

222  public static function get_form_summary() {
223  global $wpdb;
224  $form_table_name = self::get_form_table_name();
225  $lead_table_name = self::get_lead_table_name();
226 
227  $sql = "SELECT l.form_id, count(l.id) as unread_count
228  FROM $lead_table_name l
229  WHERE is_read=0 AND status='active'
230  GROUP BY form_id";
231 
232  //getting number of unread and total leads for all forms
233  $unread_results = $wpdb->get_results( $sql, ARRAY_A );
234 
235  $sql = "SELECT l.form_id, max(l.date_created) as last_lead_date, count(l.id) as total_leads
236  FROM $lead_table_name l
237  WHERE status='active'
238  GROUP BY form_id";
239 
240  $lead_date_results = $wpdb->get_results( $sql, ARRAY_A );
241 
242  $sql = "SELECT id, title, '' as last_lead_date, 0 as unread_count
243  FROM $form_table_name
244  WHERE is_active=1
245  ORDER BY title";
246 
247  $forms = $wpdb->get_results( $sql, ARRAY_A );
248 
249 
250  for ( $i = 0; $count = sizeof( $forms ), $i < $count; $i ++ ) {
251  if ( is_array( $unread_results ) ) {
252  foreach ( $unread_results as $unread_result ) {
253  if ( $unread_result['form_id'] == $forms[ $i ]['id'] ) {
254  $forms[ $i ]['unread_count'] = $unread_result['unread_count'];
255  break;
256  }
257  }
258  }
259 
260  if ( is_array( $lead_date_results ) ) {
261  foreach ( $lead_date_results as $lead_date_result ) {
262  if ( $lead_date_result['form_id'] == $forms[ $i ]['id'] ) {
263  $forms[ $i ]['last_lead_date'] = $lead_date_result['last_lead_date'];
264  $forms[ $i ]['total_leads'] = $lead_date_result['total_leads'];
265  break;
266  }
267  }
268  }
269  }
270 
271  return $forms;
272  }

274  public static function get_form_count() {

277  $results = $wpdb->get_results(
278  "
279  SELECT
280  (SELECT count(0) FROM $form_table_name WHERE is_trash = 0) as total,
281  (SELECT count(0) FROM $form_table_name WHERE is_active=1 AND is_trash = 0 ) as active,
282  (SELECT count(0) FROM $form_table_name WHERE is_active=0 AND is_trash = 0 ) as inactive,
283  (SELECT count(0) FROM $form_table_name WHERE is_trash=1) as trash
284  "
285  );
286 
287  return array(
288  'total' => intval( $results[0]->total ),
289  'active' => intval( $results[0]->active ),
290  'inactive' => intval( $results[0]->inactive ),
291  'trash' => intval( $results[0]->trash )
292  );

295  public static function get_form_id( $form_title ) {

316  public static function unserialize( $string ) {
317 
318  if ( is_serialized( $string ) ) {
319  $obj = @unserialize( $string );
320  } else {
321  $obj = json_decode( $string, true );

327  public static function get_form_meta( $form_id ) {
328  global $wpdb;
329 
330  $key = get_current_blog_id() . '_' . $form_id;
331  // return cached version if form meta has been previously retrieved for this form
332  if ( isset( self::$_current_forms[ $key ] ) ) {
333  return self::$_current_forms[ $key ];
334  }
335 
336  $table_name = self::get_meta_table_name();
337  $form_row = $wpdb->get_row( $wpdb->prepare( "SELECT display_meta, notifications FROM {$table_name} WHERE form_id=%d", $form_id ), ARRAY_A );
338 
339 
340  //Loading main form object (supports serialized strings as well as JSON strings)
341  $form = self::unserialize( $form_row['display_meta'] );
342 
343  if ( ! $form ) {
344  return null;
345  }
346 
347  //loading notifications
348  $form['notifications'] = self::unserialize( $form_row['notifications'] );
349 
350  //creating field objects and copying some form variables down to fields for easier access
351  $form = self::convert_field_objects( $form );
352 
353  // loading confirmations from legacy structure into new structure
354  $form = self::load_confirmations( $form );
355 
356  //only migrate legacy notification if there isn't any notification configured in new structure
357  if ( ! isset( $form['notifications'] ) ) {
358  $form = self::load_notifications_from_legacy( $form ); //moving notification data from legacy structure into new 'notifications' array
359  }
360 
361  //load notifications to legacy structure to maintain backward compatibility with legacy hooks and functions
362  $form = self::load_notifications_to_legacy( $form );
363 
364  $form = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_form_post_get_meta', $form_id ), $form );
365 
366  // cached form meta for cheaper retrieval on subsequent requests
367  self::$_current_forms[ $key ] = $form;
368 
369  return $form;
370  }
371 
372  public static function convert_field_objects( $form ) {
373  $page_number = 1;
374  if ( is_array( rgar( $form, 'fields' ) ) ) {
375  foreach ( $form['fields'] as &$field ) {
376  $field = GF_Fields::create( $field );
377  if ( isset( $form['id'] ) ) {
378  $field->formId = $form['id'];
379  }
380  $field->pageNumber = $page_number;
381  if ( $field->type == 'page' ) {
382  $page_number ++;
383  $field->pageNumber = $page_number;
384  }
385  }
386  }
387 
388  return $form;
389  }

391  public static function get_form_meta_by_id( $ids ) {
392  global $wpdb;
393  $form_table_name = self::get_form_table_name();
394  $meta_table_name = self::get_meta_table_name();
395 
396  if ( is_array( $ids ) ) {
397  $ids = implode( ',', array_map( 'intval', $ids ) );
398  } else {
399  $ids = intval( $ids );
400  }
401 
402  $results = $wpdb->get_results(
403  " SELECT display_meta, confirmations, notifications FROM {$form_table_name} f
404  INNER JOIN {$meta_table_name} m ON f.id = m.form_id
405  WHERE id in({$ids})", ARRAY_A
406  );
407 
408  foreach ( $results as &$result ) {
409  $form = self::unserialize( $result['display_meta'] );
410  $form['confirmations'] = self::unserialize( $result['confirmations'] );
411  $form['notifications'] = self::unserialize( $result['notifications'] );
412  //creating field objects and copying some form variables down to fields for easier access
413  $form = self::convert_field_objects( $form );
414  $result = $form;
415  }
416 
417  return $results;
418 
419  }

421  private static function load_notifications_to_legacy( $form ) {
422  if ( ! is_array( rgar( $form, 'notifications' ) ) ) {
423  return $form;
424  }
425 
426  foreach ( $form['notifications'] as $notification ) {
427  if ( ! in_array( rgar( $notification, 'type' ), array( 'user', 'admin' ) ) ) {
428  continue;
429  }
430 
431  $legacy_notification = $notification;
432 
433  if ( $notification['toType'] == 'field' ) {
434  $legacy_notification['toField'] = $notification['to'];
435  unset( $legacy_notification['to'] );
436  }
437 
438  //unsetting new properties
439  unset( $legacy_notification['toType'] );
440  unset( $legacy_notification['id'] );
441  unset( $legacy_notification['event'] );
442  unset( $legacy_notification['name'] );
443  if ( isset( $legacy_notification['type'] ) ) {
444  unset( $legacy_notification['type'] );
445  }
446 
447  //saving into form object
448  $property = $notification['type'] == 'user' ? 'autoResponder' : 'notification';
449  $form[ $property ] = $legacy_notification;
450  }
451 
452  return $form;
453  }
454 
455  private static function load_notifications_from_legacy( $form ) {
456 
457  $form['notifications'] = array();
458  if ( GFCommon::has_admin_notification( $form ) ) {
459  $admin_notification = $form['notification'];
460 
461  //if there is a fromField configured, move it to 'from' as a merge tag
462  $admin_notification = self::convert_property_to_merge_tag( $form, $admin_notification, 'from', 'fromField' );
463 
464  //if there is a fromNameField configured, move it to 'fromName' as a merge tag
465  $admin_notification = self::convert_property_to_merge_tag( $form, $admin_notification, 'fromName', 'fromNameField' );
466 
467  //if there is a replyToField configured, move it to 'replyTo' as a merge tag
468  $admin_notification = self::convert_property_to_merge_tag( $form, $admin_notification, 'replyTo', 'replyToField' );
469 
470  //if routing is configured, set toType to routing, otherwise, set it to email
471  $admin_notification['toType'] = ! rgempty( 'routing', $admin_notification ) ? 'routing' : 'email';
472 
473  $notification_id = uniqid();
474 
475  //assigning this notification to the form_submission action
476  $admin_notification['event'] = 'form_submission';
477  $admin_notification['name'] = esc_html__( 'Admin Notification', 'gravityforms' );
478  $admin_notification['type'] = 'admin';
479  $admin_notification['id'] = $notification_id;
480 
481  //copying admin notification as an item in the new notifications array
482  $form['notifications'][ $notification_id ] = $admin_notification;
483  }
484 
485  if ( GFCommon::has_user_notification( $form ) ) {
486 
487  $user_notification = $form['autoResponder'];
488 
489  //if there is a toField configured, set toType to field, if not, set it toemail
490  $to_field = rgar( $user_notification, 'toField' );
491  if ( ! empty( $to_field ) ) {
492  $user_notification['toType'] = 'field';
493  $user_notification['to'] = $to_field;
494  } else {
495  $user_notification['toType'] = 'email';
496  }
497 
498  $notification_id = uniqid();
499  //assigning this notification to the form_submission action
500  $user_notification['event'] = 'form_submission';
501  $user_notification['name'] = esc_html__( 'User Notification', 'gravityforms' );
502  $user_notification['type'] = 'user';
503  $user_notification['id'] = $notification_id;
504 
505  //copying user notification as an item in the new notifications array
506  $form['notifications'][ $notification_id ] = $user_notification;
507  }
508 
509  self::save_form_notifications( $form['id'], $form['notifications'] );
510 
511  return $form;
512  }
513 
514  private static function convert_property_to_merge_tag( $form, $array, $target_property, $source_property ) {
515  $merge_tag = self::get_field_merge_tag( $form, rgar( $array, $source_property ) );
516  if ( $merge_tag ) {
517  $array[ $target_property ] = $merge_tag;
518  unset( $array[ $source_property ] );
519  }
520 
521  return $array;
522  }
523 
524  private static function get_field_merge_tag( $form, $field_id ) {
525  $field = self::get_field( $form, $field_id );
526  if ( ! $field ) {
527  return false;
528  }
529 
530  return '{' . GFCommon::get_label( $field, $field_id ) . ':' . $field_id . '}';
531  }

584  public static function update_form_active( $form_id, $is_active ) {
585  global $wpdb;
586  $form_table = self::get_form_table_name();
587  $sql = $wpdb->prepare( "UPDATE $form_table SET is_active=%d WHERE id=%d", $is_active, $form_id );
588  $wpdb->query( $sql );
589 
590  if ( $is_active ) {
591 
592  /**
593  * Fires after an inactive form gets marked as active
594  *
595  * @param int $form_id The Form ID used to specify which form to activate
596  */
597  do_action( 'gform_post_form_activated', $form_id );
598  } else {
599 
600  /**
601  * Fires after an active form gets marked as inactive
602  *
603  * @param int $form_id The Form ID used to specify which form to activate
604  */
605  do_action( 'gform_post_form_deactivated', $form_id );
606  }

609  public static function update_notification_active( $form_id, $notification_id, $is_active ) {
610  $form = GFFormsModel::get_form_meta( $form_id );
611 
612  if ( ! isset( $form['notifications'][ $notification_id ] ) ) {
613  return new WP_Error( 'not_found', __( 'Notification not found', 'gravityforms' ) );
614  }
615 
616  $form['notifications'][ $notification_id ]['isActive'] = (bool) $is_active;
617 
618  if ( (bool) $is_active ) {
619  do_action( 'gform_pre_notification_activated', $form['notifications'][ $notification_id ], $form );
620  } else {
621  do_action( 'gform_pre_notification_deactivated', $form['notifications'][ $notification_id ], $form );
622  }
623 
624  $result = GFFormsModel::update_form_meta( $form_id, $form['notifications'], 'notifications' );
625 
626  return $result;
627  }
628

631

657  public static function update_lead_property( $lead_id, $property_name, $property_value, $update_akismet = true, $disable_hook = false ) {
658  global $wpdb;
659  $lead_table = self::get_lead_table_name();
660 
661  $lead = self::get_lead( $lead_id );
662 
663  //marking entry as 'spam' or 'not spam' with Akismet if the plugin is installed
664  if ( $update_akismet && GFCommon::akismet_enabled( $lead['form_id'] ) && $property_name == 'status' && in_array( $property_value, array( 'active', 'spam' ) ) ) {
665 
666  $current_status = $lead['status'];
667  if ( $current_status == 'spam' && $property_value == 'active' ) {
668  $form = self::get_form_meta( $lead['form_id'] );
669  GFCommon::mark_akismet_spam( $form, $lead, false );
670  } else if ( $current_status == 'active' && $property_value == 'spam' ) {
671  $form = self::get_form_meta( $lead['form_id'] );
672  GFCommon::mark_akismet_spam( $form, $lead, true );
673  }
674  }
675 
676  //updating lead
677  $result = $wpdb->update( $lead_table, array( $property_name => $property_value ), array( 'id' => $lead_id ) );
678 
679  if ( ! $disable_hook ) {
680 
681  $previous_value = rgar( $lead, $property_name );
682 
683  if ( $previous_value != $property_value ) {
684 
685  // if property is status, prev value is spam and new value is active
686  if ( $property_name == 'status' && $previous_value == 'spam' && $property_value == 'active' && ! rgar( $lead, 'post_id' ) ) {
687  $lead[ $property_name ] = $property_value;
688  $lead['post_id'] = GFCommon::create_post( isset( $form ) ? $form : GFAPI::get_form( $lead['form_id'] ), $lead );
689  }
690 
691  do_action( "gform_update_{$property_name}", $lead_id, $property_value, $previous_value );
692  }
693  }
694 
695  return $result;
696  }
697 
698  public static function update_lead( $lead ) {
699 
700  _deprecated_function( 'GFFormsModel::update_lead()', '1.8.8', 'GFAPI::update_entry()' );
701 
702  global $wpdb;
703  $lead_table = self::get_lead_table_name();
704 
705  $payment_date = strtotime( rgar( $lead, 'payment_date' ) ) ? "'" . gmdate( 'Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime( "{$lead['payment_date']}" ) ) . "'" : 'NULL';
706  $payment_amount = ! rgblank( rgar( $lead, 'payment_amount' ) ) ? (float) rgar( $lead, 'payment_amount' ) : 'NULL';
707  $transaction_type = ! rgempty( 'transaction_type', $lead ) ? intval( $lead['transaction_type'] ) : 'NULL';
708 
709  $status = ! rgempty( 'status', $lead ) ? $lead['status'] : 'active';
710  $source_url = self::truncate( rgar( $lead, 'source_url' ), 200 );
711  $user_agent = self::truncate( rgar( $lead, 'user_agent' ), 250 );
712 
713  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
714  "UPDATE $lead_table SET
715  form_id=%d,
716  post_id=%d,
717  is_starred=%d,
718  is_read=%d,
719  ip=%s,
720  source_url=%s,
721  user_agent=%s,
722  currency=%s,
723  payment_status=%s,
724  payment_date={$payment_date},
725  payment_amount={$payment_amount},
726  transaction_id=%s,
727  is_fulfilled=%d,
728  transaction_type={$transaction_type},
729  payment_method=%s,
730  status=%s
731  WHERE id=%d", rgar( $lead, 'form_id' ), rgar( $lead, 'post_id' ), rgar( $lead, 'is_starred' ), rgar( $lead, 'is_read' ), rgar( $lead, 'ip' ), $source_url, $user_agent,
732  rgar( $lead, 'currency' ), rgar( $lead, 'payment_status' ), rgar( $lead, 'transaction_id' ), rgar( $lead, 'is_fulfilled' ), rgar( $lead, 'payment_method' ), $status, rgar( $lead, 'id' )
733  );
734  $wpdb->query( $sql );
735 
736  self::set_current_lead( $lead );
737  }

739  private static function truncate( $str, $length ) {
740  if ( strlen( $str ) > $length ) {
741  $str = substr( $str, 0, $length );
742  }
743 
744  return $str;
745  }

771  public static function delete_leads_by_form( $form_id, $status = '' ) {
772  global $wpdb;
773 
774  $lead_table = self::get_lead_table_name();
775  $lead_notes_table = self::get_lead_notes_table_name();
776  $lead_detail_table = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
777  $lead_detail_long_table = self::get_lead_details_long_table_name();
778  $lead_meta_table = self::get_lead_meta_table_name();
779 
780  /**
781  * Fires when you delete entries for a specific form
782  *
783  * @param int $form_id The form ID to specify from which form to delete entries
784  * @param string $status Allows you to set the form entries to a deleted status
785  */
786  do_action( 'gform_delete_entries', $form_id, $status );
787 
788  //deleting uploaded files
789  self::delete_files_by_form( $form_id, $status );
790 
791  $status_filter = empty( $status ) ? '' : $wpdb->prepare( 'AND status=%s', $status );
792 
793  //Delete from detail long
794  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
795  " DELETE $lead_detail_long_table FROM $lead_detail_long_table
796  JOIN (
797  SELECT ld.id FROM $lead_detail_table ld
798  INNER JOIN $lead_table l ON l.id = ld.lead_id
799  WHERE l.form_id=%d AND ld.form_id=%d {$status_filter}
800  ) tmp
801  ON tmp.id = $lead_detail_long_table.lead_detail_id", $form_id, $form_id
802  );
803  $wpdb->query( $sql );
804 
805  //Delete from lead details
806  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
807  " DELETE FROM $lead_detail_table
808  WHERE lead_id IN (
809  SELECT id FROM $lead_table WHERE form_id=%d {$status_filter}
810  )", $form_id
811  );
812  $wpdb->query( $sql );
813 
814  //Delete from lead notes
815  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
816  " DELETE FROM $lead_notes_table
817  WHERE lead_id IN (
818  SELECT id FROM $lead_table WHERE form_id=%d {$status_filter}
819  )", $form_id
820  );
821  $wpdb->query( $sql );
822 
823  //Delete from lead meta
824  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
825  " DELETE FROM $lead_meta_table
826  WHERE lead_id IN (
827  SELECT id FROM $lead_table WHERE form_id=%d {$status_filter}
828  )", $form_id
829  );
830  $wpdb->query( $sql );
831 
832  //Delete from lead
833  $sql = $wpdb->prepare( "DELETE FROM $lead_table WHERE form_id=%d {$status_filter}", $form_id );
834  $wpdb->query( $sql );
835  }

918  public static function duplicate_form( $form_id ) {
919  global $wpdb;
920 
921  if ( ! GFCommon::current_user_can_any( 'gravityforms_create_form' ) ) {
922  die( esc_html__( "You don't have adequate permission to create forms.", 'gravityforms' ) );
923  }
924 
925  //finding unique title
926  $form = self::get_form( $form_id );
927  $count = 2;
928  $title = $form->title . ' - ' . esc_html__( 'Copy 1', 'gravityforms' );
929  while ( ! self::is_unique_title( $title ) ) {
930  $title = $form->title . ' - ' . sprintf( esc_html__( 'Copy %d', 'gravityforms' ), $count );
931  $count ++;
932  }
933 
934  //creating new form
935  $new_id = self::insert_form( $title );
936 
937  //copying form meta
938  $meta = self::get_form_meta( $form_id );
939  $meta['title'] = $title;
940  $meta['id'] = $new_id;
941 
942  $notifications = $meta['notifications'];
943  $confirmations = $meta['confirmations'];
944  unset( $meta['notifications'] );
945  unset( $meta['confirmations'] );
946  self::update_form_meta( $new_id, $meta );
947 
948  //copying notification meta
949  self::update_form_meta( $new_id, $notifications, 'notifications' );
950 
951  //copying confirmation meta
952  self::update_form_meta( $new_id, $confirmations, 'confirmations' );
953 
954 
955  // The gform_after_duplicate_form action is deprecated since version 1.9. Please use gform_post_form_duplicated instead
956  do_action( 'gform_after_duplicate_form', $form_id, $new_id );
957 
958  /**
959  * Fires after a form is duplicated
960  *
961  * @param int $form_id The original form's ID
962  * @param int $new_id The ID of the new, duplicated form
963  */
964  do_action( 'gform_post_form_duplicated', $form_id, $new_id );
965 
966 
967  return $new_id;
968  }
969 
970  public static function is_unique_title( $title ) {
971  $forms = self::get_forms();
972  foreach ( $forms as $form ) {
973  if ( strtolower( $form->title ) == strtolower( $title ) ) {
974  return false;
975  }
976  }
977 
978  return true;
979  }

1003  public static function update_form_meta( $form_id, $form_meta, $meta_name = 'display_meta' ) {
1004  global $wpdb;
1005 
1006  $form_meta = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_form_update_meta', $form_id ), $form_meta, $form_id, $meta_name );
1007 
1008  $meta_table_name = self::get_meta_table_name();
1009  $form_meta = json_encode( $form_meta );
1010 
1011  if ( intval( $wpdb->get_var( $wpdb->prepare( "SELECT count(0) FROM $meta_table_name WHERE form_id=%d", $form_id ) ) ) > 0 ) {
1012  $result = $wpdb->query( $wpdb->prepare( "UPDATE $meta_table_name SET $meta_name=%s WHERE form_id=%d", $form_meta, $form_id ) );
1013  } else {
1014  $result = $wpdb->query( $wpdb->prepare( "INSERT INTO $meta_table_name(form_id, $meta_name) VALUES(%d, %s)", $form_id, $form_meta ) );
1015  }
1016 
1017  $key = get_current_blog_id() . '_' . $form_id;
1018  self::$_current_forms[ $key ] = null;
1019 
1020  /**
1021  * Fires after form meta has been updated for any form
1022  *
1023  * @param mixed $form_meta The Form Meta object from the database
1024  * @param int $form_id The ID of the form data was updated
1025  * @param string $meta_name The name of the meta updated
1026  */
1027  gf_do_action( array( 'gform_post_update_form_meta', $form_id ), $form_meta, $form_id, $meta_name );
1028 
1029  return $result;
1030  }

1032  public static function delete_files( $lead_id, $form = null ) {
1033  $lead = self::get_lead( $lead_id );
1034 
1035  if ( $form == null ) {
1036  $form = self::get_form_meta( $lead['form_id'] );
1037  }
1038 
1039  // Default field types to delete
1040  $field_types = array( 'fileupload', 'post_image' );
1041 
1042  // Allow adding more file types to delete
1043  $field_types = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_field_types_delete_files', $form['id'] ), $field_types, $form );
1044 
1045  $fields = self::get_fields_by_type( $form, $field_types );
1046  if ( is_array( $fields ) ) {
1047  foreach ( $fields as $field ) {
1048 
1049  if ( $field->multipleFiles ) {
1050  $value_json = self::get_lead_field_value( $lead, $field );
1051  if ( ! empty( $value_json ) ) {
1052  $files = json_decode( $value_json, true );
1053  if ( false === empty( $files ) && is_array( $files ) ) {
1054  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
1055  self::delete_physical_file( $file );
1056  }
1057  }
1058  }
1059  } else {
1060  $value = self::get_lead_field_value( $lead, $field );
1061  self::delete_physical_file( $value );
1062  }
1063  }
1064  }
1065  }

1067  public static function delete_files_by_form( $form_id, $status = '' ) {
1068  global $wpdb;
1069  $form = self::get_form_meta( $form_id );
1070 
1071  // Default field types to delete
1072  $field_types = array( 'fileupload', 'post_image' );
1073 
1074  // Allow adding more file types to delete
1075  $field_types = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_field_types_delete_files', $form_id ), $field_types, $form );
1076 
1077 
1078  $fields = self::get_fields_by_type( $form, $field_types );
1079  if ( empty( $fields ) ) {
1080  return;
1081  }
1082 
1083  $status_filter = empty( $status ) ? '' : $wpdb->prepare( 'AND status=%s', $status );
1084  $results = $wpdb->get_results( $wpdb->prepare( "SELECT id FROM {$wpdb->prefix}rg_lead WHERE form_id=%d {$status_filter}", $form_id ), ARRAY_A );
1085 
1086  foreach ( $results as $result ) {
1087  self::delete_files( $result['id'], $form );
1088  }
1089  }

1091  public static function delete_file( $entry_id, $field_id, $file_index = 0 ) {
1092  global $wpdb;
1093 
1094  if ( $entry_id == 0 || $field_id == 0 ) {
1095  return;
1096  }
1097 
1098  $entry = self::get_lead( $entry_id );
1099  $form_id = $entry['form_id'];
1100  $form = self::get_form_meta( $form_id );
1101  $field = self::get_field( $form, $field_id );
1102  $multiple_files = $field->multipleFiles;
1103  if ( $multiple_files ) {
1104  $file_urls = json_decode( $entry[ $field_id ], true );
1105  $file_url = $file_urls[ $file_index ];
1106  unset( $file_urls[ $file_index ] );
1107  $file_urls = array_values( $file_urls );
1108  $field_value = empty( $file_urls ) ? '' : json_encode( $file_urls );
1109  } else {
1110  $file_url = $entry[ $field_id ];
1111  $field_value = '';
1112  }
1113 
1114  self::delete_physical_file( $file_url );
1115 
1116  // update lead field value - simulate form submission
1117 
1118  $lead_detail_table = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
1119  $sql = $wpdb->prepare( "SELECT id FROM $lead_detail_table WHERE lead_id=%d AND field_number BETWEEN %s AND %s", $entry_id, doubleval( $field_id ) - 0.0001, doubleval( $field_id ) + 0.0001 );
1120  $entry_detail_id = $wpdb->get_var( $sql );
1121 
1122  self::update_lead_field_value( $form, $entry, $field, $entry_detail_id, $field_id, $field_value );
1123 
1124  }
1125 
1126  private static function delete_physical_file( $file_url ) {
1127  $ary = explode( '|:|', $file_url );
1128  $url = rgar( $ary, 0 );
1129  if ( empty( $url ) ) {
1130  return;
1131  }
1132 
1133  //Convert from url to physical path
1134  if ( is_multisite() && get_site_option( 'ms_files_rewriting' ) ) {
1135  $file_path = preg_replace( "|^(.*?)/files/gravity_forms/|", BLOGUPLOADDIR . 'gravity_forms/', $url );
1136  } else {
1137  $file_path = str_replace( WP_CONTENT_URL, WP_CONTENT_DIR, $url );
1138  }
1139 
1140  if ( file_exists( $file_path ) ) {
1141  unlink( $file_path );
1142  }
1143  }
1144 
1145  public static function delete_field( $form_id, $field_id ) {
1146  global $wpdb;
1147 
1148  if ( $form_id == 0 ) {
1149  return;
1150  }
1151 
1152  do_action( 'gform_before_delete_field', $form_id, $field_id );
1153 
1154  $lead_table = self::get_lead_table_name();
1155  $lead_detail_table = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
1156  $lead_detail_long_table = self::get_lead_details_long_table_name();
1157 
1158 
1159  $form = self::get_form_meta( $form_id );
1160 
1161  $field_type = '';
1162 
1163  //Deleting field from form meta
1164  $count = sizeof( $form['fields'] );
1165  for ( $i = $count - 1; $i >= 0; $i -- ) {
1166  $field = $form['fields'][ $i ];
1167 
1168  //Deleting associated conditional logic rules
1169  if ( ! empty( $field->conditionalLogic ) ) {
1170  $rule_count = sizeof( $field->conditionalLogic['rules'] );
1171  for ( $j = $rule_count - 1; $j >= 0; $j -- ) {
1172  if ( $field->conditionalLogic['rules'][ $j ]['fieldId'] == $field_id ) {
1173  unset( $form['fields'][ $i ]->conditionalLogic['rules'][ $j ] );
1174  }
1175  }
1176  $form['fields'][ $i ]->conditionalLogic['rules'] = array_values( $form['fields'][ $i ]->conditionalLogic['rules'] );
1177 
1178  //If there aren't any rules, remove the conditional logic
1179  if ( sizeof( $form['fields'][ $i ]->conditionalLogic['rules'] ) == 0 ) {
1180  $form['fields'][ $i ]->conditionalLogic = false;
1181  }
1182  }
1183 
1184  //Deleting field from form meta
1185  if ( $field->id == $field_id ) {
1186  $field_type = $field->type;
1187  unset( $form['fields'][ $i ] );
1188  }
1189  }
1190 
1191  //removing post content and title template if the field being deleted is a post content field or post title field
1192  if ( $field_type == 'post_content' ) {
1193  $form['postContentTemplateEnabled'] = false;
1194  $form['postContentTemplate'] = '';
1195  } else if ( $field_type == 'post_title' ) {
1196  $form['postTitleTemplateEnabled'] = false;
1197  $form['postTitleTemplate'] = '';
1198  }
1199 
1200  //Deleting associated routing rules
1201  if ( ! empty( $form['notification']['routing'] ) ) {
1202  $routing_count = sizeof( $form['notification']['routing'] );
1203  for ( $j = $routing_count - 1; $j >= 0; $j -- ) {
1204  if ( intval( $form['notification']['routing'][ $j ]['fieldId'] ) == $field_id ) {
1205  unset( $form['notification']['routing'][ $j ] );
1206  }
1207  }
1208  $form['notification']['routing'] = array_values( $form['notification']['routing'] );
1209 
1210  //If there aren't any routing, remove it
1211  if ( sizeof( $form['notification']['routing'] ) == 0 ) {
1212  $form['notification']['routing'] = null;
1213  }
1214  }
1215 
1216  $form['fields'] = array_values( $form['fields'] );
1217  self::update_form_meta( $form_id, $form );
1218 
1219  //Delete from grid column meta
1220  $columns = self::get_grid_column_meta( $form_id );
1221  $count = sizeof( $columns );
1222  for ( $i = $count - 1; $i >= 0; $i -- ) {
1223  if ( intval( rgar( $columns, $i ) ) == intval( $field_id ) ) {
1224  unset( $columns[ $i ] );
1225  }
1226  }
1227  self::update_grid_column_meta( $form_id, $columns );
1228 
1229  //Delete from detail long
1230  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
1231  "DELETE $lead_detail_long_table FROM $lead_detail_long_table
1232  JOIN (
1233  SELECT ld.id FROM $lead_detail_table ld
1234  WHERE form_id=%d AND field_number >= %d AND field_number < %d
1235  ) tmp
1236  ON tmp.id = $lead_detail_long_table.lead_detail_id",
1237  $form_id, $field_id, $field_id + 1
1238  );
1239 
1240  $wpdb->query( $sql );
1241 
1242 
1243  //Delete from lead details
1244  $sql = $wpdb->prepare( "DELETE FROM $lead_detail_table WHERE form_id=%d AND field_number >= %d AND field_number < %d", $form_id, $field_id, $field_id + 1 );
1245  $wpdb->query( $sql );
1246 
1247  //Delete leads with no details
1248  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
1249  " DELETE FROM $lead_table
1250  WHERE form_id=%d
1251  AND id NOT IN(
1252  SELECT DISTINCT(lead_id) FROM $lead_detail_table WHERE form_id=%d
1253  )", $form_id, $form_id
1254  );
1255  $wpdb->query( $sql );
1256 
1257  /**
1258  * Fires after a field is deleted
1259  *
1260  * @param int $form_id The form ID where the form was deleted
1261  * @param int $field_id The ID of the field that was deleted
1262  */
1263  do_action( 'gform_after_delete_field', $form_id, $field_id );
1264  }

1349  public static function get_ip() {
1350 
1351  $ip = '';
1352  $headers = array( 'HTTP_CLIENT_IP', 'HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR', 'REMOTE_ADDR' );
1353 
1354  foreach ( $headers as $header ) {
1355  $ip = rgar( $_SERVER, $header );
1356  if ( $ip ) {
1357  break;
1358  }
1359  }
1360 
1361  // HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR can return a comma separated list of IPs; using the first one
1362  $ips = explode( ',', $ip );
1363 
1364  return $ips[0];
1365  }

1367  public static function save_lead( $form, &$lead ) {
1368  global $wpdb;
1369 
1370  GFCommon::log_debug( __METHOD__ . '(): Saving entry.' );
1371 
1372  $is_form_editor = GFCommon::is_form_editor();
1373  $is_entry_detail = GFCommon::is_entry_detail();
1374  $is_admin = $is_form_editor || $is_entry_detail;
1375 
1376  if ( $is_admin && ! GFCommon::current_user_can_any( 'gravityforms_edit_entries' ) ) {
1377  die( esc_html__( "You don't have adequate permission to edit entries.", 'gravityforms' ) );
1378  }
1379 
1380  $lead_detail_table = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
1381  $is_new_lead = $lead == null;
1382 
1383  //Inserting lead if null
1384  if ( $is_new_lead ) {
1385 
1386  global $current_user;
1387  $user_id = $current_user && $current_user->ID ? $current_user->ID : 'NULL';
1388 
1389  $lead_table = RGFormsModel::get_lead_table_name();
1390  $user_agent = self::truncate( rgar( $_SERVER, 'HTTP_USER_AGENT' ), 250 );
1391  $user_agent = sanitize_text_field( $user_agent );
1392  $source_url = self::truncate( self::get_current_page_url(), 200 );
1393 
1394  /**
1395  * Allow the currency code to be overridden.
1396  *
1397  * @param string $currency The three character ISO currency code to be stored in the entry. Default is value returned by GFCommon::get_currency()
1398  * @param array $form The form currently being processed.
1399  *
1400  */
1401  $currency = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_currency_pre_save_entry', $form['id'] ), GFCommon::get_currency(), $form );
1402 
1403  $wpdb->query( $wpdb->prepare( "INSERT INTO $lead_table(form_id, ip, source_url, date_created, user_agent, currency, created_by) VALUES(%d, %s, %s, utc_timestamp(), %s, %s, {$user_id})", $form['id'], self::get_ip(), $source_url, $user_agent, $currency ) );
1404 
1405 
1406  //reading newly created lead id
1407  $lead_id = $wpdb->insert_id;
1408  $lead = array( 'id' => $lead_id );
1409 
1410  GFCommon::log_debug( __METHOD__ . "(): Entry record created in the database. ID: {$lead_id}." );
1411  }
1412 
1413  $current_fields = $wpdb->get_results( $wpdb->prepare( "SELECT id, field_number FROM $lead_detail_table WHERE lead_id=%d", $lead['id'] ) );
1414 
1415  $total_fields = array();
1416  /* @var $calculation_fields GF_Field[] */
1417  $calculation_fields = array();
1418  $recalculate_total = false;
1419 
1420  GFCommon::log_debug( __METHOD__ . '(): Saving entry fields.' );
1421 
1422  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
1423  /* @var $field GF_Field */
1424 
1425  // ignore the honeypot field
1426  if ( $field->type == 'honeypot' ) {
1427  continue;
1428  }
1429 
1430  //Ignore fields that are marked as display only
1431  if ( $field->displayOnly && $field->type != 'password' ) {
1432  continue;
1433  }
1434 
1435  //ignore pricing fields in the entry detail
1436  if ( RG_CURRENT_VIEW == 'entry' && GFCommon::is_pricing_field( $field->type ) ) {
1437  continue;
1438  }
1439 
1440 
1441  //process total field after all fields have been saved
1442  if ( $field->type == 'total' ) {
1443  $total_fields[] = $field;
1444  continue;
1445  }
1446 
1447  $is_entry_update = RG_CURRENT_VIEW == 'entry' || ! $is_new_lead;
1448 
1449  $read_value_from_post = $is_new_lead || ! isset( $lead[ 'date_created' ] );
1450 
1451  //only save fields that are not hidden (except when updating an entry)
1452  if( $is_entry_update || ! GFFormsModel::is_field_hidden( $form, $field, array(), $read_value_from_post ? null : $lead ) ) {
1453 
1454  // process calculation fields after all fields have been saved (moved after the is hidden check)
1455  if ( $field->has_calculation() ) {
1456  $calculation_fields[] = $field;
1457  continue;
1458  }
1459 
1460  if ( $field->type == 'post_category' ) {
1461  $field = GFCommon::add_categories_as_choices( $field, '' );
1462  }
1463 
1464  $inputs = $field->get_entry_inputs();
1465  if ( is_array( $inputs ) ) {
1466  foreach ( $inputs as $input ) {
1467  self::save_input( $form, $field, $lead, $current_fields, $input['id'] );
1468  }
1469  } else {
1470  self::save_input( $form, $field, $lead, $current_fields, $field->id );
1471  }
1472  }
1473  }
1474 
1475  if ( ! empty( $calculation_fields ) ) {
1476  foreach ( $calculation_fields as $calculation_field ) {
1477  $inputs = $calculation_field->get_entry_inputs();
1478  if ( is_array( $inputs ) ) {
1479  foreach ( $inputs as $input ) {
1480  self::save_input( $form, $calculation_field, $lead, $current_fields, $input['id'] );
1481  self::refresh_lead_field_value( $lead['id'], $input['id'] );
1482  }
1483  } else {
1484  self::save_input( $form, $calculation_field, $lead, $current_fields, $calculation_field->id );
1485  self::refresh_lead_field_value( $lead['id'], $calculation_field->id );
1486  }
1487  }
1488  self::refresh_product_cache( $form, $lead = RGFormsModel::get_lead( $lead['id'] ) );
1489  }
1490 
1491  //saving total field as the last field of the form.
1492  if ( ! empty( $total_fields ) ) {
1493  foreach ( $total_fields as $total_field ) {
1494  self::save_input( $form, $total_field, $lead, $current_fields, $total_field->id );
1495  self::refresh_lead_field_value( $lead['id'], $total_field['id'] );
1496  }
1497  }
1498  GFCommon::log_debug( __METHOD__ . '(): Finished saving entry fields.' );
1499  }
1500 
1501  public static function create_lead( $form ) {
1502  global $current_user;
1503 
1504  $total_fields = array();
1505  $calculation_fields = array();
1506 
1507  $lead = array();
1508  $lead['id'] = null;
1509  $lead['post_id'] = null;
1510  $lead['date_created'] = null;
1511  $lead['form_id'] = $form['id'];
1512  $lead['ip'] = self::get_ip();
1513  $source_url = self::truncate( self::get_current_page_url(), 200 );
1514  $lead['source_url'] = esc_url_raw( $source_url );
1515  $user_agent = strlen( $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'] ) > 250 ? substr( $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'], 0, 250 ) : $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'];
1516  $lead['user_agent'] = sanitize_text_field( $user_agent );
1517  $lead['created_by'] = $current_user && $current_user->ID ? $current_user->ID : 'NULL';
1518 
1519  /**
1520  * Allow the currency code to be overridden.
1521  *
1522  * @param string $currency The three character ISO currency code to be stored in the entry. Default is value returned by GFCommon::get_currency()
1523  * @param array $form The form currently being processed.
1524  *
1525  */
1526  $lead['currency'] = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_currency_pre_save_entry', $form['id'] ), GFCommon::get_currency(), $form );
1527 
1528  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
1529  /* @var $field GF_Field */
1530 
1531  // ignore fields that are marked as display only
1532  if ( $field->displayOnly && $field->type != 'password' ) {
1533  continue;
1534  }
1535 
1536  // process total field after all fields have been saved
1537  if ( $field->type == 'total' ) {
1538  $total_fields[] = $field;
1539  continue;
1540  }
1541 
1542  // process calculation fields after all fields have been saved
1543  if ( $field->has_calculation() ) {
1544  $calculation_fields[] = $field;
1545  continue;
1546  }
1547 
1548  // only save fields that are not hidden
1549  if ( ! RGFormsModel::is_field_hidden( $form, $field, array() ) ) {
1550 
1551  if ( $field->type == 'post_category' ) {
1552  $field = GFCommon::add_categories_as_choices( $field, '' );
1553  }
1554 
1555  $inputs = $field->get_entry_inputs();
1556 
1557  if ( is_array( $inputs ) ) {
1558  foreach ( $inputs as $input ) {
1559  $lead[ (string) $input['id'] ] = self::get_prepared_input_value( $form, $field, $lead, $input['id'] );
1560  }
1561  } else {
1562  $lead[ $field->id ] = self::get_prepared_input_value( $form, $field, $lead, $field->id );
1563  }
1564  }
1565  }
1566 
1567  if ( ! empty( $calculation_fields ) ) {
1568  foreach ( $calculation_fields as $field ) {
1569  /* @var $field GF_Field */
1570 
1571  // only save fields that are not hidden
1572  if ( RGFormsModel::is_field_hidden( $form, $field, array() ) ) {
1573  continue;
1574  }
1575 
1576  $inputs = $field->get_entry_inputs();
1577 
1578  if ( is_array( $inputs ) ) {
1579  foreach ( $inputs as $input ) {
1580  $lead[ (string) $input['id'] ] = self::get_prepared_input_value( $form, $field, $lead, $input['id'] );
1581  }
1582  } else {
1583  $lead[ $field->id ] = self::get_prepared_input_value( $form, $field, $lead, $field->id );
1584  }
1585  }
1586  self::refresh_product_cache( $form, $lead );
1587  }
1588 
1589  // saving total field as the last field of the form.
1590  if ( ! empty( $total_fields ) ) {
1591  foreach ( $total_fields as $total_field ) {
1592  $lead[ $total_field->id ] = self::get_prepared_input_value( $form, $total_field, $lead, $total_field->id );
1593  }
1594  }
1595 
1596  return $lead;
1597  }
1598 
1599  public static function get_prepared_input_value( $form, $field, $lead, $input_id ) {
1600 
1601  $input_name = 'input_' . str_replace( '.', '_', $input_id );
1602  if ( $field->enableCopyValuesOption && rgpost( 'input_' . $field->id . '_copy_values_activated' ) ) {
1603  $source_field_id = $field->copyValuesOptionField;
1604  $source_input_name = str_replace( 'input_' . $field->id, 'input_' . $source_field_id, $input_name );
1605  $value = rgpost( $source_input_name );
1606  } else {
1607  $value = rgpost( $input_name );
1608  }
1609 
1610  $is_form_editor = GFCommon::is_form_editor();
1611  $is_entry_detail = GFCommon::is_entry_detail();
1612  $is_admin = $is_form_editor || $is_entry_detail;
1613 
1614  if ( empty( $value ) && $field->adminOnly && ! $is_admin ) {
1615  $value = self::get_default_value( $field, $input_id );
1616  }
1617 
1618  switch ( self::get_input_type( $field ) ) {
1619 
1620  case 'post_image':
1621  $file_info = self::get_temp_filename( $form['id'], $input_name );
1622  if ( ! empty( $file_info ) ) {
1623  $file_path = self::get_file_upload_path( $form['id'], $file_info['uploaded_filename'] );
1624  $url = $file_path['url'];
1625 
1626  $image_title = isset( $_POST[ "{$input_name}_1" ] ) ? strip_tags( $_POST[ "{$input_name}_1" ] ) : '';
1627  $image_caption = isset( $_POST[ "{$input_name}_4" ] ) ? strip_tags( $_POST[ "{$input_name}_4" ] ) : '';
1628  $image_description = isset( $_POST[ "{$input_name}_7" ] ) ? strip_tags( $_POST[ "{$input_name}_7" ] ) : '';
1629 
1630  $value = ! empty( $url ) ? $url . '|:|' . $image_title . '|:|' . $image_caption . '|:|' . $image_description : '';
1631  }
1632  break;
1633 
1634  case 'fileupload' :
1635  if ( $field->multipleFiles ) {
1636  if ( ! empty( $value ) ) {
1637  $value = json_encode( $value );
1638  }
1639  } else {
1640  $file_info = self::get_temp_filename( $form['id'], $input_name );
1641  if ( ! empty( $file_info ) ) {
1642  $file_path = self::get_file_upload_path( $form['id'], $file_info['uploaded_filename'] );
1643  $value = $file_path['url'];
1644  }
1645  }
1646 
1647  break;
1648 
1649  default:
1650 
1651  // processing values so that they are in the correct format for each input type
1652  $value = self::prepare_value( $form, $field, $value, $input_name, rgar( $lead, 'id' ), $lead );
1653 
1654  }
1655 
1656  return gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_save_field_value', $form['id'], $field->id ), $value, $lead, $field, $form, $input_id );
1657  }
1658 
1659  public static function refresh_product_cache( $form, $lead, $use_choice_text = false, $use_admin_label = false ) {
1660 
1661  $cache_options = array(
1662  array( false, false ),
1663  array( false, true ),
1664  array( true, false ),
1665  array( true, true ),
1666  );
1667 
1668  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
1669  /* @var $field GF_Field */
1670  if ( $field->has_calculation() ) {
1671  //deleting field value cache for calculated fields
1672  $cache_key = 'GFFormsModel::get_lead_field_value_' . $lead['id'] . '_' . $field->id;
1673  GFCache::delete( $cache_key );
1674  }
1675  }
1676 
1677  foreach ( $cache_options as $cache_option ) {
1678  list( $use_choice_text, $use_admin_label ) = $cache_option;
1679  if ( gform_get_meta( rgar( $lead, 'id' ), "gform_product_info_{$use_choice_text}_{$use_admin_label}" ) ) {
1680  gform_delete_meta( rgar( $lead, 'id' ), "gform_product_info_{$use_choice_text}_{$use_admin_label}" );
1681  GFCommon::get_product_fields( $form, $lead, $use_choice_text, $use_admin_label );
1682  }
1683  }
1684 
1685  }
1686 
1687  /**
1688  * Check whether a field is hidden via conditional logic.
1689  *
1690  * @param array $form Form object.
1691  * @param GF_Field $field Field object.
1692  * @param array $field_values Default field values for this form. Used when form has not yet been submitted. Pass an array if no default field values are available/required.
1693  * @param array $lead Optional, default is null. If lead object is available, pass the lead.
1694  *
1695  * @return mixed
1696  */
1697  public static function is_field_hidden( $form, $field, $field_values, $lead = null ) {
1698 
1699  if ( empty( $field ) ) {
1700  return false;
1701  }
1702 
1703  $cache_key = 'GFFormsModel::is_field_hidden_' . $form['id'] . '_' . $field->id;
1704  $display = GFCache::get( $cache_key );
1705  if ( $display !== false ) {
1706  return $display;
1707  }
1708 
1709  $section = self::get_section( $form, $field->id );
1710  $section_display = self::get_field_display( $form, $section, $field_values, $lead );
1711 
1712  //if section is hidden, hide field no matter what. if section is visible, see if field is supposed to be visible
1713  if ( $section_display == 'hide' ) {
1714  $display = 'hide';
1715  } else if ( self::is_page_hidden( $form, $field->pageNumber, $field_values, $lead ) ) {
1716  $display = 'hide';
1717  } else {
1718  $display = self::get_field_display( $form, $field, $field_values, $lead );
1719 
1720  return $display == 'hide';
1721  }
1722 
1723  GFCache::set( $cache_key, $display );
1724 
1725  return $display == 'hide';
1726  }
1727 
1728  public static function is_page_hidden( $form, $page_number, $field_values, $lead = null ) {
1729  $page = self::get_page_by_number( $form, $page_number );
1730 
1731  if ( ! $page ) {
1732  return false;
1733  }
1734 
1735  $display = self::get_field_display( $form, $page, $field_values, $lead );
1736 
1737  return $display == 'hide';
1738  }
1739 
1740  public static function get_page_by_number( $form, $page_number ) {

1771  public static function is_value_match( $field_value, $target_value, $operation = 'is', $source_field = null, $rule = null, $form = null ) {
1772 
1773  $is_match = false;
1774 
1775  if ( $source_field && is_subclass_of( $source_field, 'GF_Field' ) && $source_field->type == 'post_category' ) {
1776  $field_value = GFCommon::prepare_post_category_value( $field_value, $source_field, 'conditional_logic' );
1777  }
1778 
1779  if ( ! empty( $field_value ) && ! is_array( $field_value ) && is_subclass_of( $source_field, 'GF_Field' ) && $source_field->type == 'multiselect' ) {
1780  $field_value = explode( ',', $field_value );
1781  } // convert the comma-delimited string into an array
1782 
1783  $form_id = $source_field instanceof GF_Field ? $source_field->formId : 0;
1784 
1785  $target_value = GFFormsModel::maybe_trim_input( $target_value, $form_id, $source_field );
1786 
1787 
1788  if ( is_array( $field_value ) ) {
1789  $field_value = array_values( $field_value ); //returning array values, ignoring keys if array is associative
1790  $match_count = 0;
1791  foreach ( $field_value as $val ) {
1792  $val = GFFormsModel::maybe_trim_input( GFCommon::get_selection_value( $val ), rgar( $source_field, 'formId' ), $source_field );
1793  if ( self::matches_operation( $val, $target_value, $operation ) ) {
1794  $match_count ++;
1795  }
1796  }
1797  // if operation is Is Not, none of the values in the array can match the target value.
1798  $is_match = $operation == 'isnot' ? $match_count == count( $field_value ) : $match_count > 0;
1799  } else if ( self::matches_operation( GFFormsModel::maybe_trim_input( GFCommon::get_selection_value( $field_value ), $form_id, $source_field ), $target_value, $operation ) ) {
1800  $is_match = true;
1801  }
1802 
1803  return apply_filters( 'gform_is_value_match', $is_match, $field_value, $target_value, $operation, $source_field, $rule );
1804  }

1806  private static function try_convert_float( $text ) {
1807 
1808  /*
1809  global $wp_locale;
1810  $number_format = $wp_locale->number_format['decimal_point'] == ',' ? 'decimal_comma' : 'decimal_dot';
1811 
1812  if ( is_numeric( $text ) && $number_format == 'decimal_comma' ) {
1813  return GFCommon::format_number( $text, 'decimal_comma' );
1814  } else if ( GFCommon::is_numeric( $text, $number_format ) ) {
1815  return GFCommon::clean_number( $text, $number_format );
1816  }
1817  */
1818 
1819  $number_format = 'decimal_dot';
1820  if ( GFCommon::is_numeric( $text, $number_format ) ) {
1821  return GFCommon::clean_number( $text, $number_format );
1822  }
1823 
1824  return $text;
1825  }
1826 
1827  public static function matches_operation( $val1, $val2, $operation ) {
1828 
1829  $val1 = ! rgblank( $val1 ) ? strtolower( $val1 ) : '';
1830  $val2 = ! rgblank( $val2 ) ? strtolower( $val2 ) : '';
1831 
1832  switch ( $operation ) {
1833  case 'is' :
1834  return $val1 == $val2;
1835  break;
1836 
1837  case 'isnot' :
1838  return $val1 != $val2;
1839  break;
1840 
1841  case 'greater_than':
1842  case '>' :
1843  $val1 = self::try_convert_float( $val1 );
1844  $val2 = self::try_convert_float( $val2 );
1845 
1846  return $val1 > $val2;
1847  break;
1848 
1849  case 'less_than':
1850  case '<' :
1851  $val1 = self::try_convert_float( $val1 );
1852  $val2 = self::try_convert_float( $val2 );
1853 
1854  return $val1 < $val2;
1855  break;
1856 
1857  case 'contains' :
1858  return ! empty( $val2 ) && strpos( $val1, $val2 ) !== false;
1859  break;
1860 
1861  case 'starts_with' :
1862  return ! rgblank( $val2 ) && strpos( $val1, $val2 ) === 0;
1863  break;
1864 
1865  case 'ends_with' :
1866  $start = strlen( $val1 ) - strlen( $val2 );
1867  if ( $start < 0 ) {
1868  return false;
1869  }
1870 
1871  $tail = substr( $val1, $start );
1872 
1873  return $val2 == $tail;
1874  break;
1875  }
1876 
1877 
1878  return false;
1879  }
1880 
1881  /**
1882  * @param $form
1883  * @param GF_Field $field
1884  * @param $field_values
1885  * @param null $lead
1886  *
1887  * @return string
1888  */
1889  private static function get_field_display( $form, $field, $field_values, $lead = null ) {
1890 
1891  if ( empty( $field ) ) {
1892  return 'show';
1893  }
1894 
1895  $logic = $field->conditionalLogic;
1896 
1897  //if this field does not have any conditional logic associated with it, it won't be hidden
1898  if ( empty( $logic ) ) {
1899  return 'show';
1900  }
1901 
1902 
1903  $match_count = 0;
1904  foreach ( $logic['rules'] as $rule ) {
1905  $source_field = RGFormsModel::get_field( $form, $rule['fieldId'] );
1906  $field_value = empty( $lead ) ? self::get_field_value( $source_field, $field_values ) : self::get_lead_field_value( $lead, $source_field );
1907 
1908  $is_value_match = self::is_value_match( $field_value, $rule['value'], $rule['operator'], $source_field, $rule, $form );
1909 
1910  if ( $is_value_match ) {
1911  $match_count ++;
1912  }
1913  }
1914 
1915  $do_action = ( $logic['logicType'] == 'all' && $match_count == sizeof( $logic['rules'] ) ) || ( $logic['logicType'] == 'any' && $match_count > 0 );
1916  $is_hidden = ( $do_action && $logic['actionType'] == 'hide' ) || ( ! $do_action && $logic['actionType'] == 'show' );
1917 
1918  return $is_hidden ? 'hide' : 'show';
1919  }

2076

2078  }

2080  /**
2081  * Returns a UUID. Uses openssl_random_pseudo_bytes() if available and falls back to mt_rand().
2082  *
2083  * source: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2040240/php-function-to-generate-v4-uuid
2084  *
2085  * @param string $s The separator e.g. '-'
2086  *
2087  * @return string
2088  */
2089  public static function get_uuid( $s = '' ) {
2090 
2091  if ( function_exists( 'openssl_random_pseudo_bytes' ) ) { // PHP 5 >= 5.3.0
2092  $data = openssl_random_pseudo_bytes( 16 );
2093 
2094  $data[6] = chr( ord( $data[6] ) & 0x0f | 0x40 ); // set version to 0100
2095  $data[8] = chr( ord( $data[8] ) & 0x3f | 0x80 ); // set bits 6-7 to 10
2096 
2097  return vsprintf( "%s%s{$s}%s{$s}%s{$s}%s{$s}%s%s%s", str_split( bin2hex( $data ), 4 ) );
2098  } else {
2099  return sprintf(
2100  "%04x%04x{$s}%04x{$s}%04x{$s}%04x{$s}%04x%04x%04x",
2101  // 32 bits for "time_low"
2102  mt_rand( 0, 0xffff ), mt_rand( 0, 0xffff ),
2103 
2104  // 16 bits for 'time_mid'
2105  mt_rand( 0, 0xffff ),
2106 
2107  // 16 bits for 'time_hi_and_version',
2108  // four most significant bits holds version number 4
2109  mt_rand( 0, 0x0fff ) | 0x4000,
2110 
2111  // 16 bits, 8 bits for 'clk_seq_hi_res',
2112  // 8 bits for 'clk_seq_low',
2113  // two most significant bits holds zero and one for variant DCE1.1
2114  mt_rand( 0, 0x3fff ) | 0x8000,
2115 
2116  // 48 bits for 'node'
2117  mt_rand( 0, 0xffff ), mt_rand( 0, 0xffff ), mt_rand( 0, 0xffff )
2118  );
2119  }
2120 
2121  }

2155  public static function get_parameter_value( $name, $field_values, $field ) {
2156  $value = stripslashes( rgget( $name ) );
2157  if ( empty( $value ) ) {
2158  $value = rgget( $name, $field_values );
2159  }
2160 
2161  //converting list format
2162  if ( RGFormsModel::get_input_type( $field ) == 'list' ) {
2163 
2164  //transforms this: col1|col2,col1b|col2b into this: col1,col2,col1b,col2b
2165  $column_count = count( $field->choices );
2166 
2167  $rows = explode( ',', $value );
2168  $ary_rows = array();
2169  if ( ! empty( $rows ) ) {
2170  foreach ( $rows as $row ) {
2171  $ary_rows = array_merge( $ary_rows, rgexplode( '|', $row, $column_count ) );
2172  }
2173 
2174  $value = $ary_rows;
2175  }
2176  }
2177 
2178  return gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_field_value', $name ), $value, $field, $name );
2179  }

2181  public static function get_default_value( $field, $input_id ) {

2185

2189  }
2190  } else if ( $field->type == 'checkbox' ) {
2191  for ( $i = 0, $count = sizeof( $field->inputs ); $i < $count; $i ++ ) {
2192  $input = $field->inputs[ $i ];
2193  $choice = $field->choices[ $i ];
2194  if ( $input['id'] == $input_id && rgar( $choice, 'isSelected' ) ) {
2195  return $choice['value'];
2196  }
2197  }
2198 
2199  return '';
2200  } else {
2201  foreach ( $field->choices as $choice ) {
2202  if ( rgar( $choice, 'isSelected' ) || $field->type == 'post_category' ) {
2203  return $choice['value'];
2204  }
2205  }
2206 
2207  return '';
2208  }

2226  private static function get_post_field_value( $field, $lead ) {
2227 
2228  if ( is_array( $field->get_entry_inputs() ) ) {
2229  $value = array();
2230  foreach ( $field->inputs as $input ) {
2231  $val = isset( $lead[ strval( $input['id'] ) ] ) ? $lead[ strval( $input['id'] ) ] : '';
2232  if ( ! empty( $val ) ) {
2233 
2234  // replace commas in individual values to prevent individual value from being split into multiple values (checkboxes, multiselects)
2235  if ( in_array( $field->get_input_type(), array( 'checkbox', 'multiselect' ) ) ) {
2236  $val = str_replace( ',', '&#44;', $val );
2237  }
2238 
2239  $value[] = $val;
2240  }
2241  }
2242  $value = implode( ',', $value );
2243  } else {
2244  $value = isset( $lead[ $field->id ] ) ? $lead[ $field->id ] : '';
2245  }
2246 
2247  return $value;

2250  private static function get_post_fields( $form, $lead ) {
2251 
2252  $post_data = array();
2253  $post_data['post_custom_fields'] = array();
2254  $post_data['tags_input'] = array();
2255  $categories = array();
2256  $images = array();
2257 
2258  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
2259 
2260  if ( $field->type == 'post_category' ) {
2261  $field = GFCommon::add_categories_as_choices( $field, '' );
2262  }
2263 
2264  $value = self::get_post_field_value( $field, $lead );
2265 
2266  switch ( $field->type ) {
2267  case 'post_title' :
2268  case 'post_excerpt' :
2269  case 'post_content' :
2270  $post_data[ $field->type ] = $value;
2271  break;
2272 
2273  case 'post_tags' :
2274  $tags = explode( ',', $value );
2275  if ( is_array( $tags ) && sizeof( $tags ) > 0 ) {
2276  $post_data['tags_input'] = array_merge( $post_data['tags_input'], $tags );
2277  }
2278  break;
2279 
2280  case 'post_custom_field' :
2281 
2282  $type = self::get_input_type( $field );
2283  if ( 'fileupload' === $type && $field->multipleFiles ) {
2284  $value = json_decode( $value, true );
2285  }
2286 
2287  $meta_name = $field->postCustomFieldName;
2288 
2289  if ( ! isset( $post_data['post_custom_fields'][ $meta_name ] ) ) {
2290  $post_data['post_custom_fields'][ $meta_name ] = $value;
2291  } else if ( ! is_array( $post_data['post_custom_fields'][ $meta_name ] ) ) {
2292  $post_data['post_custom_fields'][ $meta_name ] = array( $post_data['post_custom_fields'][ $meta_name ], $value );
2293  } else {
2294  $post_data['post_custom_fields'][ $meta_name ][] = $value;
2295  }
2296 
2297  break;
2298 
2299  case 'post_category' :
2300  foreach ( explode( ',', $value ) as $cat_string ) {
2301  list( $cat_name, $cat_id ) = rgexplode( ':', $cat_string, 2 );
2302  array_push( $categories, $cat_id );
2303  }
2304  break;
2305 
2306  case 'post_image' :
2307  $ary = ! empty( $value ) ? explode( '|:|', $value ) : array();
2308  $url = count( $ary ) > 0 ? $ary[0] : '';
2309  $title = count( $ary ) > 1 ? $ary[1] : '';
2310  $caption = count( $ary ) > 2 ? $ary[2] : '';
2311  $description = count( $ary ) > 3 ? $ary[3] : '';
2312 
2313  array_push( $images, array( 'field_id' => $field->id, 'url' => $url, 'title' => $title, 'description' => $description, 'caption' => $caption ) );
2314  break;
2315  }
2316  }
2317 
2318  $post_data['post_status'] = rgar( $form, 'postStatus' );
2319  $post_data['post_category'] = ! empty( $categories ) ? $categories : array( rgar( $form, 'postCategory' ) );
2320  $post_data['images'] = $images;
2321 
2322  //setting current user as author depending on settings
2323  $post_data['post_author'] = $form['useCurrentUserAsAuthor'] && ! empty( $lead['created_by'] ) ? $lead['created_by'] : $form['postAuthor'];
2324 
2325  return $post_data;
2326  }

2328  public static function get_custom_field_names() {
2329  global $wpdb;
2330  $keys = $wpdb->get_col(
2331  "
2332  SELECT meta_key
2333  FROM $wpdb->postmeta
2334  WHERE meta_key NOT LIKE '\_%'
2335  GROUP BY meta_key
2336  ORDER BY meta_id DESC"
2337  );
2338 
2339  if ( $keys ) {
2340  natcasesort( $keys );
2341  }
2342 
2343  return $keys;

2361  private static function get_default_post_title() {
2362  global $wpdb;
2363  $title = 'Untitled';
2364  $count = 1;
2365 
2366  $titles = $wpdb->get_col( "SELECT post_title FROM $wpdb->posts WHERE post_title like '%Untitled%'" );
2367  $titles = array_values( $titles );
2368  while ( in_array( $title, $titles ) ) {
2369  $title = "Untitled_$count";

2376  public static function prepare_date( $date_format, $value ) {
2377  $format = empty( $date_format ) ? 'mdy' : $date_format;
2378  $date_info = GFCommon::parse_date( $value, $format );
2379  if ( ! empty( $date_info ) && ! GFCommon::is_empty_array( $date_info ) ) {
2380  $value = sprintf( '%s-%02d-%02d', $date_info['year'], $date_info['month'], $date_info['day'] );
2381  } else {
2382  $value = '';
2383  }
2384 
2385  return $value;
2386  }

2388  /**
2389  * Prepare the value before saving it to the lead.
2390  *
2391  * @param mixed $form
2392  * @param GF_Field $field
2393  * @param mixed $value
2394  * @param mixed $input_name
2395  * @param mixed $lead_id the current lead ID, used for fields that are processed after other fields have been saved (ie Total, Calculations)
2396  * @param mixed $lead passed by the RGFormsModel::create_lead() method, lead ID is not available for leads created by this function
2397  *
2398  * @return mixed
2399  */
2400  public static function prepare_value( $form, $field, $value, $input_name, $lead_id, $lead = array() ) {
2401 
2402  $value = $field->get_value_save_entry( $value, $form, $input_name, $lead_id, $lead );
2403 
2404 
2405  // special format for Post Category fields
2406  if ( $field->type == 'post_category' ) {
2407 
2408  $full_values = array();
2409 
2410  if ( ! is_array( $value ) ) {
2411  $value = explode( ',', $value );
2412  }
2413 
2414  foreach ( $value as $cat_id ) {
2415  $cat = get_term( $cat_id, 'category' );
2416  $full_values[] = ! is_wp_error( $cat ) && is_object( $cat ) ? $cat->name . ':' . $cat_id : '';
2417  }
2418 
2419  $value = implode( ',', $full_values );
2420  }
2421 
2422  //do not save price fields with blank price
2423  if ( $field->enablePrice ) {
2424  $ary = explode( '|', $value );
2425  $label = count( $ary ) > 0 ? $ary[0] : '';
2426  $price = count( $ary ) > 1 ? $ary[1] : '';
2427 
2428  $is_empty = ( strlen( trim( $price ) ) <= 0 );
2429  if ( $is_empty ) {
2430  $value = '';
2431  }
2432  }
2433 
2434  return $value;
2435  }
2436 
2437  public static function is_checkbox_checked( $field_id, $field_label, $lead, $form ) {
2438 
2439  //looping through lead detail values trying to find an item identical to the column label. Mark with a tick if found.
2440  $lead_field_keys = array_keys( $lead );
2441  foreach ( $lead_field_keys as $input_id ) {
2442  //mark as a tick if input label (from form meta) is equal to submitted value (from lead)
2443  if ( is_numeric( $input_id ) && absint( $input_id ) == absint( $field_id ) ) {
2444  if ( $lead[ $input_id ] == $field_label ) {
2445  return $lead[ $input_id ];
2446  } else {
2447  $field = RGFormsModel::get_field( $form, $field_id );
2448  if ( $field->enableChoiceValue || $field->enablePrice ) {
2449  foreach ( $field->choices as $choice ) {
2450  if ( $choice['value'] == $lead[ $field_id ] ) {
2451  return $choice['value'];
2452  } else if ( $field->enablePrice ) {
2453  $ary = explode( '|', $lead[ $field_id ] );
2454  $val = count( $ary ) > 0 ? $ary[0] : '';
2455  $price = count( $ary ) > 1 ? $ary[1] : '';
2456 
2457  if ( $val == $choice['value'] ) {
2458  return $choice['value'];
2459  }
2460  }
2461  }
2462  }
2463  }
2464  }
2465  }
2466 
2467  return false;
2468  }

2471  _deprecated_function( 'GFFormsModel::get_fileupload_value', '1.9', 'GF_Field_Fileupload::get_fileupload_value' );
2472  global $_gf_uploaded_files;

2500  public static function get_form_unique_id( $form_id ) {
2501  $unique_id = '';
2502  if ( rgpost( 'gform_submit' ) == $form_id ) {
2503  $posted_uid = rgpost( 'gform_unique_id' );
2504  if ( false === empty( $posted_uid ) && ctype_alnum( $posted_uid )) {
2505  $unique_id = $posted_uid;
2506  self::$unique_ids[ $form_id ] = $unique_id;
2507  } elseif ( isset( self::$unique_ids[ $form_id ] ) ) {
2508  $unique_id = self::$unique_ids[ $form_id ];
2509  } else {
2510  $unique_id = uniqid();
2511  self::$unique_ids[ $form_id ] = $unique_id;
2512  }
2513  }
2514 
2515  return $unique_id;
2516  }

2518  public static function get_temp_filename( $form_id, $input_name ) {
2519 
2520  $uploaded_filename = ! empty( $_FILES[ $input_name ]['name'] ) && $_FILES[ $input_name ]['error'] === 0 ? $_FILES[ $input_name ]['name'] : '';
2521 
2522  if ( empty( $uploaded_filename ) && isset( self::$uploaded_files[ $form_id ] ) ) {
2523  $uploaded_filename = rgget( $input_name, self::$uploaded_files[ $form_id ] );
2524  }
2525 
2526  if ( empty( $uploaded_filename ) ) {
2527  return false;
2528  }
2529 
2530  $form_unique_id = self::get_form_unique_id( $form_id );
2531  $pathinfo = pathinfo( $uploaded_filename );
2532 
2533  return array( 'uploaded_filename' => $uploaded_filename, 'temp_filename' => "{$form_unique_id}_{$input_name}.{$pathinfo['extension']}" );
2534 
2535  }

2537  public static function get_choice_text( $field, $value, $input_id = 0 ) {
2538  if ( ! is_array( $field->choices ) ) {
2539  return $value;
2540  }
2541 
2542  foreach ( $field->choices as $choice ) {
2543  if ( is_array( $value ) && self::choice_value_match( $field, $choice, $value[ $input_id ] ) ) {
2544  return $choice['text'];
2545  } else if ( ! is_array( $value ) && self::choice_value_match( $field, $choice, $value ) ) {
2546  return $choice['text'];
2547  }
2548  }
2549 
2550  return is_array( $value ) ? '' : $value;
2551  }
2552 
2553 
2554  public static function choice_value_match( $field, $choice, $value ) {
2555  $choice_value = GFFormsModel::maybe_trim_input( $choice['value'], $field->formId, $field );
2556  $value = GFFormsModel::maybe_trim_input( $value, $field->formId, $field );
2557 
2558  $allowed_html = wp_kses_allowed_html( 'post' );
2559  $sanitized_value = wp_kses( $value, $allowed_html );
2560 
2561 
2562  if ( $choice_value == $value || $choice_value == $sanitized_value ) {
2563  return true;
2564  } else if ( $field->enablePrice ) {
2565  $ary = explode( '|', $value );
2566 
2567  $val = count( $ary ) > 0 ? $ary[0] : '';
2568  $sanitized_val = wp_kses( $val, $allowed_html );
2569 
2570  $price = count( $ary ) > 1 ? $ary[1] : '';
2571 
2572  if ( $choice['value'] == $val || $choice['value'] == $sanitized_val ) {
2573  return true;
2574  }
2575  } // add support for prepopulating multiselects @alex
2576  else if ( RGFormsModel::get_input_type( $field ) == 'multiselect' ) {
2577  $values = explode( ',', $value );
2578  $sanitized_values = explode( ',', $sanitized_value );
2579 
2580  if ( in_array( $choice_value, $values ) || in_array( $choice_value, $sanitized_values ) ) {
2581  return true;
2582  }
2583  }
2584 
2585  return false;
2586  }
2587 
2588  public static function choices_value_match( $field, $choices, $value ) {
2589  foreach ( $choices as $choice ) {
2590  if ( self::choice_value_match( $field, $choice, $value ) ) {
2591  return true;
2592  }
2593  }
2594 
2595  return false;
2596  }

2598  public static function create_post( $form, &$lead ) {
2599 
2600  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Starting.' );
2601 
2602  $has_post_field = false;
2603  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
2604  $is_hidden = self::is_field_hidden( $form, $field, array(), $lead );
2605  if ( ! $is_hidden && in_array( $field->type, array( 'post_category', 'post_title', 'post_content', 'post_excerpt', 'post_tags', 'post_custom_field', 'post_image' ) ) ) {
2606  $has_post_field = true;
2607  break;
2608  }
2609  }
2610 
2611  //if this form does not have any post fields, don't create a post
2612  if ( ! $has_post_field ) {
2613  GFCommon::log_debug( "GFFormsModel::create_post(): Stopping. The form doesn't have any post fields." );
2614 
2615  return $lead;
2616  }
2617 
2618 
2619  //processing post fields
2620  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Getting post fields.' );
2621  $post_data = self::get_post_fields( $form, $lead );
2622 
2623  //allowing users to change post fields before post gets created
2624  $post_data = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_post_data', $form['id'] ), $post_data, $form, $lead );
2625 
2626  //adding default title if none of the required post fields are in the form (will make sure wp_insert_post() inserts the post)
2627  if ( empty( $post_data['post_title'] ) && empty( $post_data['post_content'] ) && empty( $post_data['post_excerpt'] ) ) {
2628  $post_data['post_title'] = self::get_default_post_title();
2629  }
2630 
2631  // remove original post status and save it for later
2632  $post_status = $post_data['post_status'];
2633 
2634  // replace original post status with 'draft' so other plugins know this post is not fully populated yet
2635  $post_data['post_status'] = 'draft';
2636 
2637  // inserting post
2638  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Inserting post via wp_insert_post().' );
2639  $post_id = wp_insert_post( $post_data );
2640  GFCommon::log_debug( "GFFormsModel::create_post(): Result from wp_insert_post(): {$post_id}." );
2641 
2642  //adding form id and entry id hidden custom fields
2643  add_post_meta( $post_id, '_gform-form-id', $form['id'] );
2644  add_post_meta( $post_id, '_gform-entry-id', $lead['id'] );
2645 
2646  //creating post images
2647  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Creating post images.' );
2648  $post_images = array();
2649  foreach ( $post_data['images'] as $image ) {
2650  $image_meta = array(
2651  'post_excerpt' => $image['caption'],
2652  'post_content' => $image['description'],
2653  );
2654 
2655  //adding title only if it is not empty. It will default to the file name if it is not in the array
2656  if ( ! empty( $image['title'] ) ) {
2657  $image_meta['post_title'] = $image['title'];
2658  }
2659 
2660  if ( ! empty( $image['url'] ) ) {
2661  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Adding image: ' . $image['url'] );
2662  $media_id = self::media_handle_upload( $image['url'], $post_id, $image_meta );
2663 
2664  if ( $media_id ) {
2665 
2666  //save media id for post body/title template variable replacement (below)
2667  $post_images[ $image['field_id'] ] = $media_id;
2668  $lead[ $image['field_id'] ] .= "|:|$media_id";
2669 
2670  // set featured image
2671  $field = RGFormsModel::get_field( $form, $image['field_id'] );
2672  if ( $field->postFeaturedImage ) {
2673  set_post_thumbnail( $post_id, $media_id );
2674  }
2675  }
2676  }
2677  }
2678 
2679  //adding custom fields
2680  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Adding custom fields.' );
2681  foreach ( $post_data['post_custom_fields'] as $meta_name => $meta_value ) {
2682  if ( ! is_array( $meta_value ) ) {
2683  $meta_value = array( $meta_value );
2684  }
2685 
2686  $meta_index = 0;
2687  foreach ( $meta_value as $value ) {
2688  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Getting custom field: ' . $meta_name );
2689  $custom_field = self::get_custom_field( $form, $meta_name, $meta_index );
2690 
2691  //replacing template variables if template is enabled
2692  if ( $custom_field && rgget( 'customFieldTemplateEnabled', $custom_field ) ) {
2693  //replacing post image variables
2694  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Replacing post image variables.' );
2695  $value = GFCommon::replace_variables_post_image( $custom_field['customFieldTemplate'], $post_images, $lead );
2696 
2697  //replacing all other variables
2698  $value = GFCommon::replace_variables( $value, $form, $lead, false, false, false );
2699 
2700  // replace conditional shortcodes
2701  $value = do_shortcode( $value );
2702  }
2703  switch ( RGFormsModel::get_input_type( $custom_field ) ) {
2704  case 'list' :
2705  $value = maybe_unserialize( $value );
2706  if ( is_array( $value ) ) {
2707  foreach ( $value as $item ) {
2708  if ( is_array( $item ) ) {
2709  $item = implode( '|', $item );
2710  }
2711 
2712  if ( ! rgblank( $item ) ) {
2713  add_post_meta( $post_id, $meta_name, $item );
2714  }
2715  }
2716  }
2717  break;
2718 
2719  case 'multiselect' :
2720  case 'checkbox' :
2721  $value = explode( ',', $value );
2722  if ( is_array( $value ) ) {
2723  foreach ( $value as $item ) {
2724  if ( ! rgblank( $item ) ) {
2725  // add post meta and replace HTML symbol in $item with real comma
2726  add_post_meta( $post_id, $meta_name, str_replace( '&#44;', ',', $item ) );
2727  }
2728  }
2729  }
2730  break;
2731 
2732  case 'date' :
2733  $value = GFCommon::date_display( $value, rgar( $custom_field, 'dateFormat' ) );
2734  if ( ! rgblank( $value ) ) {
2735  add_post_meta( $post_id, $meta_name, $value );
2736  }
2737  break;
2738 
2739  default :
2740  if ( ! rgblank( $value ) ) {
2741  add_post_meta( $post_id, $meta_name, $value );
2742  }
2743  break;
2744  }
2745 
2746  $meta_index ++;
2747  }
2748  }
2749 
2750  $has_content_field = sizeof( self::get_fields_by_type( $form, array( 'post_content' ) ) ) > 0;
2751  $has_title_field = sizeof( self::get_fields_by_type( $form, array( 'post_title' ) ) ) > 0;
2752  $post = false;
2753 
2754  //if a post field was configured with a content or title template, process template
2755  if ( ( rgar( $form, 'postContentTemplateEnabled' ) && $has_content_field ) || ( rgar( $form, 'postTitleTemplateEnabled' ) && $has_title_field ) ) {
2756  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Processing template.' );
2757  $post = get_post( $post_id );
2758 
2759  if ( rgar( $form, 'postContentTemplateEnabled' ) && $has_content_field ) {
2760 
2761  //replacing post image variables
2762  $post_content = GFCommon::replace_variables_post_image( $form['postContentTemplate'], $post_images, $lead );
2763 
2764  //replacing all other variables
2765  $post_content = GFCommon::replace_variables( $post_content, $form, $lead, false, false, false );
2766 
2767  //updating post content
2768  $post->post_content = $post_content;
2769  }
2770 
2771  if ( rgar( $form, 'postTitleTemplateEnabled' ) && $has_title_field ) {
2772 
2773  //replacing post image variables
2774  $post_title = GFCommon::replace_variables_post_image( $form['postTitleTemplate'], $post_images, $lead );
2775 
2776  //replacing all other variables
2777  $post_title = GFCommon::replace_variables( $post_title, $form, $lead, false, false, false );
2778 
2779  // replace conditional shortcodes
2780  $post_title = do_shortcode( $post_title );
2781 
2782  //updating post
2783  $post->post_title = $post_title;
2784 
2785  $post->post_name = $post_title;
2786  }
2787  }
2788 
2789  // update post status back to original status (if not draft)
2790  if ( $post_status != 'draft' ) {
2791  $post = is_object( $post ) ? $post : get_post( $post_id );
2792  $post->post_status = $post_status;
2793  }
2794 
2795  // if post has been modified since creation, save updates
2796  if ( is_object( $post ) ) {
2797  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Updating post.' );
2798  wp_update_post( $post );
2799  }
2800 
2801 
2802  //adding post format
2803  if ( current_theme_supports( 'post-formats' ) && rgar( $form, 'postFormat' ) ) {
2804 
2805  $formats = get_theme_support( 'post-formats' );
2806  $post_format = rgar( $form, 'postFormat' );
2807 
2808  if ( is_array( $formats ) ) {
2809  $formats = $formats[0];
2810  if ( in_array( $post_format, $formats ) ) {
2811  set_post_format( $post_id, $post_format );
2812  } else if ( '0' == $post_format ) {
2813  set_post_format( $post_id, false );
2814  }
2815  }
2816  }
2817 
2818  //update post_id field if a post was created
2819  $lead['post_id'] = $post_id;
2820  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::create_post(): Updating entry with post id.' );
2821  self::update_lead_property( $lead['id'], 'post_id', $post_id );
2822 
2823  /**
2824  * Fires after a post, from a form with post fields, is created
2825  *
2826  * @param int $form['id'] The ID of the form where the new post was created
2827  * @param int $post_id The new Post ID created after submission
2828  * @param array $lead The Lead Object
2829  * @param array $form The Form Object for the form used to create the post
2830  */
2831  gf_do_action( array( 'gform_after_create_post', $form['id'] ), $post_id, $lead, $form );
2832 
2833  return $post_id;
2834  }
2835 
2836  private static function get_custom_field( $form, $meta_name, $meta_index ) {
2837  $custom_fields = self::get_fields_by_type( $form, array( 'post_custom_field' ) );
2838 
2839  $index = 0;
2840  foreach ( $custom_fields as $field ) {
2841  if ( $field->postCustomFieldName == $meta_name ) {
2842  if ( $meta_index == $index ) {
2843  return $field;
2844  }
2845  $index ++;
2846  }
2847  }
2848 
2849  return false;
2850  }

2852  private static function copy_post_image( $url, $post_id ) {
2853  $time = current_time( 'mysql' );
2854 
2855  if ( $post = get_post( $post_id ) ) {
2856  if ( substr( $post->post_date, 0, 4 ) > 0 ) {
2857  $time = $post->post_date;
2858  }
2859  }
2860 
2861  //making sure there is a valid upload folder
2862  if ( ! ( ( $upload_dir = wp_upload_dir( $time ) ) && false === $upload_dir['error'] ) ) {
2863  return false;
2864  }
2865 
2866  $form_id = get_post_meta( $post_id, '_gform-form-id', true );
2867 
2868  /**
2869  * Filter the media upload location.
2870  *
2871  * @param array $upload_dir The current upload directory’s path and url.
2872  * @param int $form_id The ID of the form currently being processed.
2873  * @param int $post_id The ID of the post created from the entry currently being processed.
2874  */
2875  $upload_dir = gf_apply_filters( 'gform_media_upload_path', $form_id, $upload_dir, $form_id, $post_id );
2876 
2877  if ( ! file_exists( $upload_dir['path'] ) ) {
2878  if ( ! wp_mkdir_p( $upload_dir['path'] ) ) {
2879  return false;
2880  }
2881  }
2882 
2883  $name = basename( $url );
2884  $filename = wp_unique_filename( $upload_dir['path'], $name );
2885 
2886  // the destination path
2887  $new_file = $upload_dir['path'] . "/$filename";
2888 
2889  // the source path
2890  $y = substr( $time, 0, 4 );
2891  $m = substr( $time, 5, 2 );
2892  $target_root = self::get_upload_path( $form_id ) . "/$y/$m/";
2893  $target_root_url = self::get_upload_url( $form_id ) . "/$y/$m/";

3021  /**
3022  * Updates an existing field value in the database.
3023  *
3024  * @param array $form
3025  * @param array $lead
3026  * @param GF_Field $field
3027  * @param int $lead_detail_id
3028  * @param string $input_id
