3030  *
3031  * @return bool
3032  */
3033  public static function update_lead_field_value( $form, $lead, $field, $lead_detail_id, $input_id, $value ) {
3034  global $wpdb;
3035 
3036  if ( is_array( $value ) ) {
3037  GFCommon::log_debug( __METHOD__ . '(): bailing. value is an array.' );
3038  return false;
3039  }
3040 
3041  $lead_id = $lead['id'];
3042  $form_id = $form['id'];
3043  $lead_detail_table = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
3044  $lead_detail_long_table = self::get_lead_details_long_table_name();
3045 
3046  if ( ! rgblank( $value ) ) {
3047 
3048  $value = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_save_field_value', $form['id'], $field->id ), $value, $lead, $field, $form, $input_id );
3049  $truncated_value = get_option( 'gform_longtext_ready' ) ? $value : GFCommon::safe_substr( $value, 0, GFORMS_MAX_FIELD_LENGTH );
3050 
3051  if ( $lead_detail_id > 0 ) {
3052 
3053  $result = $wpdb->update( $lead_detail_table, array( 'value' => $truncated_value ), array( 'id' => $lead_detail_id ), array( '%s' ), array( '%d' ) );
3054  if ( false === $result ) {
3055  return false;
3056  }
3057 
3058  //insert, update or delete long value
3059  $sql = $wpdb->prepare( "SELECT count(0) FROM $lead_detail_long_table WHERE lead_detail_id=%d", $lead_detail_id );
3060  $has_long_field = intval( $wpdb->get_var( $sql ) ) > 0;
3061 
3062  //delete long field if value has been shortened
3063  if ( $has_long_field && GFCommon::safe_strlen( $value ) <= GFORMS_MAX_FIELD_LENGTH ) {
3064  $sql = $wpdb->prepare( "DELETE FROM $lead_detail_long_table WHERE lead_detail_id=%d", $lead_detail_id );
3065  $result = $wpdb->query( $sql );
3066  if ( false === $result ) {
3067  return false;
3068  }
3069  } //update long field
3070  else if ( $has_long_field ) {
3071  $result = $wpdb->update( $lead_detail_long_table, array( 'value' => $value ), array( 'lead_detail_id' => $lead_detail_id ), array( '%s' ), array( '%d' ) );
3072  if ( false === $result ) {
3073  return false;
3074  }
3075  } //insert long field (value has been increased)
3076  else if ( GFCommon::safe_strlen( $value ) > GFORMS_MAX_FIELD_LENGTH ) {
3077  $result = $wpdb->insert( $lead_detail_long_table, array( 'lead_detail_id' => $lead_detail_id, 'value' => $value ), array( '%d', '%s' ) );
3078  if ( false === $result ) {
3079  return false;
3080  }
3081  }
3082  } else {
3083  $result = $wpdb->insert( $lead_detail_table, array( 'lead_id' => $lead_id, 'form_id' => $form_id, 'field_number' => $input_id, 'value' => $truncated_value ), array( '%d', '%d', '%F', '%s' ) );
3084  if ( false === $result ) {
3085  return false;
3086  }
3087 
3088  if ( GFCommon::safe_strlen( $value ) > GFORMS_MAX_FIELD_LENGTH ) {
3089 
3090  //read newly created lead detal id
3091  $lead_detail_id = $wpdb->insert_id;
3092 
3093  //insert long value
3094  $result = $wpdb->insert( $lead_detail_long_table, array( 'lead_detail_id' => $lead_detail_id, 'value' => $value ), array( '%d', '%s' ) );
3095  if ( false === $result ) {
3096  return false;
3097  }
3098  }
3099  }
3100  } else {
3101 
3102 
3103  //Deleting long field if there is one
3104  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
3105  "DELETE $lead_detail_long_table FROM $lead_detail_long_table
3106  JOIN (
3107  SELECT ld.id FROM $lead_detail_table ld
3108  WHERE lead_id=%d AND field_number BETWEEN %s AND %s
3109  ) tmp
3110  ON tmp.id = $lead_detail_long_table.lead_detail_id",
3111  $lead_id, doubleval( $input_id ) - 0.0001, doubleval( $input_id ) + 0.0001
3112  );
3113 
3114  $result = $wpdb->query( $sql );
3115 
3116  if ( $result === false ) {
3117  return false;
3118  }
3119 
3120 
3121  //Deleting details for this field
3122  $sql = $wpdb->prepare( "DELETE FROM $lead_detail_table WHERE lead_id=%d AND field_number BETWEEN %s AND %s ", $lead_id, doubleval( $input_id ) - 0.0001, doubleval( $input_id ) + 0.0001 );
3123  $result = $wpdb->query( $sql );
3124  if ( false === $result ) {
3125  return false;
3126  }
3127  }
3128 
3129  return true;
3130  }

3209  public static function get_file_upload_path( $form_id, $file_name ) {

3323  public static function is_duplicate( $form_id, $field, $value ) {
3324  global $wpdb;
3325 
3326  $lead_detail_table_name = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
3327  $lead_table_name = self::get_lead_table_name();
3328  $lead_detail_long = self::get_lead_details_long_table_name();
3329  $is_long = ! is_array( $value ) && strlen( $value ) > GFORMS_MAX_FIELD_LENGTH - 10;
3330 
3331  $sql_comparison = $is_long ? '( ld.value = %s OR ldl.value = %s )' : 'ld.value = %s';
3332 
3333  switch ( GFFormsModel::get_input_type( $field ) ) {
3334  case 'time':
3335  $value = sprintf( "%02d:%02d %s", $value[0], $value[1], $value[2] );
3336  break;
3337  case 'date':
3338  $value = self::prepare_date( $field->dateFormat, $value );
3339  break;
3340  case 'number':
3341  $value = GFCommon::clean_number( $value, $field->numberFormat );
3342  break;
3343  case 'phone':
3344  $value = str_replace( array( ')', '(', '-', ' ' ), '', $value );
3345  $sql_comparison = 'replace( replace( replace( replace( ld.value, ")", "" ), "(", "" ), "-", "" ), " ", "" ) = %s';
3346  break;
3347  case 'email':
3348  $value = is_array( $value ) ? rgar( $value, 0 ) : $value;
3349  break;
3350  }
3351 
3352  $inner_sql_template = "SELECT %s as input, ld.lead_id
3353  FROM {$lead_detail_table_name} ld
3354  INNER JOIN {$lead_table_name} l ON l.id = ld.lead_id\n";
3355 
3356  if ( $is_long ) {
3357  $inner_sql_template .= "INNER JOIN {$lead_detail_long} ldl ON ldl.lead_detail_id = ld.id\n";
3358  }
3359 
3360  $inner_sql_template .= "WHERE l.form_id=%d AND ld.form_id=%d
3361  AND ld.field_number between %s AND %s
3362  AND status='active' AND {$sql_comparison}";
3363 
3364  $sql = "SELECT count(distinct input) as match_count FROM ( ";
3365 
3366  $input_count = 1;
3367  if ( is_array( $field->get_entry_inputs() ) ) {
3368  $input_count = sizeof( $field->inputs );
3369  foreach ( $field->inputs as $input ) {
3370  $union = empty( $inner_sql ) ? '' : ' UNION ALL ';
3371  $inner_sql .= $union . $wpdb->prepare( $inner_sql_template, $input['id'], $form_id, $form_id, $input['id'] - 0.0001, $input['id'] + 0.0001, $value[ $input['id'] ], $value[ $input['id'] ] );
3372  }
3373  } else {
3374  $inner_sql = $wpdb->prepare( $inner_sql_template, $field->id, $form_id, $form_id, doubleval( $field->id ) - 0.0001, doubleval( $field->id ) + 0.0001, $value, $value );
3375  }
3376 
3377  $sql .= $inner_sql . "
3378  ) as count
3379  GROUP BY lead_id
3380  ORDER BY match_count DESC";
3381 
3382  $count = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_is_duplicate', $form_id ), $wpdb->get_var( $sql ), $form_id, $field, $value );
3383 
3384  return $count != null && $count >= $input_count;
3385  }

3406  public static function get_lead_notes( $lead_id ) {

3416  )
3417  );
3418  }

3420  public static function refresh_lead_field_value( $lead_id, $field_id ) {
3421  $cache_key = 'GFFormsModel::get_lead_field_value_' . $lead_id . '_' . $field_id;
3422  GFCache::delete( $cache_key );
3423  }
3424 
3425  /**
3426  * @param $lead
3427  * @param $field GF_Field
3428  *
3429  * @return array|bool|mixed|string|void
3430  */
3431  public static function get_lead_field_value( $lead, $field ) {
3432 
3433  if ( empty( $lead ) ) {
3434  return;
3435  }
3436 
3437  $field_id = $field instanceof GF_Field ? $field->id : $field['id'];
3438 
3439  //returning cache entry if available
3440  $cache_key = 'GFFormsModel::get_lead_field_value_' . $lead['id'] . '_' . $field_id;
3441 
3442  $cache_value = GFCache::get( $cache_key, $dummy, false );
3443  if ( $cache_value !== false ) {
3444  return $cache_value;
3445  }
3446 
3447  $max_length = GFORMS_MAX_FIELD_LENGTH;
3448  $value = array();
3449 
3450  $inputs = $field instanceof GF_Field ? $field->get_entry_inputs() : rgar( $field, 'inputs' );
3451 
3452  if ( is_array( $inputs ) ) {
3453  //making sure values submitted are sent in the value even if
3454  //there isn't an input associated with it
3455  $lead_field_keys = array_keys( $lead );
3456  natsort( $lead_field_keys );
3457  foreach ( $lead_field_keys as $input_id ) {
3458  if ( is_numeric( $input_id ) && absint( $input_id ) == absint( $field_id ) ) {
3459  $val = $lead[ $input_id ];
3460  if ( strlen( $val ) >= ( $max_length - 10 ) ) {
3461  if ( empty( $form ) ) {
3462  $form = RGFormsModel::get_form_meta( $lead['form_id'] );
3463  }
3464 
3465  $long_choice = self::get_field_value_long( $lead, $input_id, $form );
3466  } else {
3467  $long_choice = $val;
3468  }
3469 
3470  $value[ $input_id ] = ! empty( $long_choice ) ? $long_choice : $val;
3471  }
3472  }
3473  } else {
3474  $val = rgget( $field_id, $lead );
3475 
3476  //To save a database call to get long text, only getting long text if regular field is 'somewhat' large (i.e. max - 50)
3477  if ( strlen( $val ) >= ( $max_length - 50 ) ) {
3478  if ( empty( $form ) ) {
3479  $form = RGFormsModel::get_form_meta( $lead['form_id'] );
3480  }
3481 
3482  $long_text = self::get_field_value_long( $lead, $field_id, $form );
3483  }
3484 
3485  $value = ! empty( $long_text ) ? $long_text : $val;
3486  }
3487 
3488 
3489 
3490  //filtering lead value
3491  $value = apply_filters( 'gform_get_field_value', $value, $lead, $field );
3492 
3493  //saving value in global variable to optimize performance
3494  GFCache::set( $cache_key, $value );
3495 
3496  return $value;
3497  }
3498 
3499  public static function get_field_value_long( $lead, $field_number, $form, $apply_filter = true ) {
3500  global $wpdb;
3501  $detail_table_name = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
3502  $long_table_name = self::get_lead_details_long_table_name();
3503 
3504  $sql = $wpdb->prepare(
3505  " SELECT l.value FROM $detail_table_name d
3506  INNER JOIN $long_table_name l ON l.lead_detail_id = d.id
3507  WHERE lead_id=%d AND field_number BETWEEN %s AND %s", $lead['id'], doubleval( $field_number ) - 0.0001, doubleval( $field_number ) + 0.0001
3508  );
3509 
3510  $val = $wpdb->get_var( $sql );
3511 
3512  //running aform_get_input_value when needed
3513  if ( $apply_filter ) {
3514  $field = RGFormsModel::get_field( $form, $field_number );
3515  $input_id = (string) $field_number == (string) $field->id ? '' : $field_number;
3516  $val = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_get_input_value', $field->formId, $field->id, $input_id ), $val, $lead, $field, $input_id );
3517  }
3518 
3519  return $val;
3520  }

3540  public static function get_leads( $form_id, $sort_field_number = 0, $sort_direction = 'DESC', $search = '', $offset = 0, $page_size = 30, $star = null, $read = null, $is_numeric_sort = false, $start_date = null, $end_date = null, $status = 'active', $payment_status = false ) {
3541  global $wpdb;
3542 
3543  if ( empty( $sort_field_number ) ) {
3544  $sort_field_number = 'date_created';
3545  }
3546 
3547  if ( is_numeric( $sort_field_number ) ) {
3548  $sql = self::sort_by_custom_field_query( $form_id, $sort_field_number, $sort_direction, $search, $offset, $page_size, $star, $read, $is_numeric_sort, $status, $payment_status );
3549  } else {
3550  $sql = self::sort_by_default_field_query( $form_id, $sort_field_number, $sort_direction, $search, $offset, $page_size, $star, $read, $is_numeric_sort, $start_date, $end_date, $status, $payment_status );
3551  }
3552 
3553  //initializing rownum
3554  $wpdb->query( 'select @rownum:=0' );
3555 
3556  //getting results
3557  $results = $wpdb->get_results( $sql );
3558 
3559  $leads = self::build_lead_array( $results );
3560 
3561  return $leads;
3562  }

3567  private static function sort_by_custom_field_query( $form_id, $sort_field_number = 0, $sort_direction = 'DESC', $search = '', $offset = 0, $page_size = 30, $star = null, $read = null, $is_numeric_sort = false, $status = 'active', $payment_status = false ) {
3568  global $wpdb;
3569  if ( ! is_numeric( $form_id ) || ! is_numeric( $sort_field_number ) || ! is_numeric( $offset ) || ! is_numeric( $page_size ) ) {
3570  return '';
3571  }
3572 
3573  $lead_detail_table_name = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
3574  $lead_table_name = self::get_lead_table_name();
3575 
3576  $sort_direction = strtolower( $sort_direction ) == 'desc' ? 'DESC' : 'ASC' ;
3577 
3578  $orderby = $is_numeric_sort ? "ORDER BY query, (value+0) $sort_direction" : "ORDER BY query, value $sort_direction";
3579  $is_default = false;
3580 
3581  $search_sql = self::get_leads_where_sql( compact( 'form_id', 'search', 'status', 'star', 'read', 'start_date', 'end_date', 'payment_status', 'is_default' ) );
3582 
3583  $field_number_min = $sort_field_number - 0.0001;
3584  $field_number_max = $sort_field_number + 0.0001;
3585 
3586  $sql = "
3587  SELECT filtered.sort, l.*, d.field_number, d.value
3588  FROM $lead_table_name l
3589  INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id
3590  INNER JOIN (
3591  SELECT distinct sorted.sort, l.id
3592  FROM $lead_table_name l
3593  INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id
3594  INNER JOIN (
3595  SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as sort, id FROM (
3596  SELECT 0 as query, lead_id as id, value
3597  FROM $lead_detail_table_name
3598  WHERE form_id=$form_id
3599  AND field_number between $field_number_min AND $field_number_max
3600 
3601  UNION ALL
3602 
3603  SELECT 1 as query, l.id, d.value
3604  FROM $lead_table_name l
3605  LEFT OUTER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id AND field_number between $field_number_min AND $field_number_max
3606  WHERE l.form_id=$form_id
3607  AND d.lead_id IS NULL
3608 
3609  ) sorted1
3610  $orderby
3611  ) sorted ON d.lead_id = sorted.id
3612  $search_sql
3613  LIMIT $offset,$page_size
3614  ) filtered ON filtered.id = l.id
3615  ORDER BY filtered.sort";
3616 
3617  return $sql;
3618  }

3620  private static function sort_by_default_field_query( $form_id, $sort_field, $sort_direction = 'DESC', $search = '', $offset = 0, $page_size = 30, $star = null, $read = null, $is_numeric_sort = false, $start_date = null, $end_date = null, $status = 'active', $payment_status = false ) {
3621  global $wpdb;
3622 
3623  if ( ! is_numeric( $form_id ) || ! is_numeric( $offset ) || ! is_numeric( $page_size ) ) {
3624  return '';
3625  }
3626 
3627  $lead_detail_table_name = self::get_lead_details_table_name();
3628  $lead_table_name = self::get_lead_table_name();
3629  $lead_meta_table_name = self::get_lead_meta_table_name();
3630 
3631  $where = self::get_leads_where_sql( compact( 'form_id', 'search', 'status', 'star', 'read', 'start_date', 'end_date', 'payment_status' ) );
3632 
3633  $entry_meta = self::get_entry_meta( $form_id );
3634  $entry_meta_sql_join = '';
3635  if ( false === empty( $entry_meta ) && array_key_exists( $sort_field, $entry_meta ) ) {
3636  $entry_meta_sql_join = $wpdb->prepare(
3637  "INNER JOIN
3638  (
3639  SELECT
3640  lead_id, meta_value as $sort_field
3641  from $lead_meta_table_name
3642  WHERE meta_key = %s
3643  ) lead_meta_data ON lead_meta_data.lead_id = l.id
3644  ", $sort_field
3645  );
3646  $is_numeric_sort = $entry_meta[ $sort_field ]['is_numeric'];
3647  }
3648  $grid_columns = RGFormsModel::get_grid_columns( $form_id );
3649  if ( $sort_field != 'date_created' && false === array_key_exists( $sort_field, $grid_columns ) ) {
3650  $sort_field = 'date_created';
3651  }
3652  $orderby = $is_numeric_sort ? "ORDER BY ($sort_field+0) $sort_direction" : "ORDER BY $sort_field $sort_direction";
3653 
3654  $sql = "
3655  SELECT filtered.sort, l.*, d.field_number, d.value
3656  FROM $lead_table_name l
3657  INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id
3658  INNER JOIN
3659  (
3660  SELECT @rownum:=@rownum + 1 as sort, id
3661  FROM
3662  (
3663  SELECT distinct l.id
3664  FROM $lead_table_name l
3665  INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id
3666  $entry_meta_sql_join
3667  $where
3668  $orderby
3669  LIMIT $offset,$page_size
3670  ) page
3671  ) filtered ON filtered.id = l.id
3672  ORDER BY filtered.sort";
3673 
3674  return $sql;
3675  }

3677  public static function get_leads_where_sql( $args ) {
3678  global $wpdb;
3679 
3680  extract(
3681  wp_parse_args(
3682  $args, array(
3683  'form_id' => false,
3684  'search' => '',
3685  'status' => 'active',
3686  'star' => null,
3687  'read' => null,
3688  'start_date' => null,
3689  'end_date' => null,
3690  'payment_status' => null,
3691  'is_default' => true,
3692  )
3693  )
3694  );
3695 
3696  $where = array();
3697 
3698  if ( $is_default ) {
3699  $where[] = "l.form_id = $form_id";
3700  }
3701 
3702  if ( $search && $is_default ) {
3703  $where[] = $wpdb->prepare( 'value LIKE %s', "%$search%" );
3704  } else if ( $search ) {
3705  $where[] = $wpdb->prepare( 'd.value LIKE %s', "%$search%" );
3706  }
3707 
3708  if ( $star !== null && $status == 'active' ) {
3709  $where[] = $wpdb->prepare( "is_starred = %d AND status = 'active'", $star );
3710  }
3711 
3712  if ( $read !== null && $status == 'active' ) {
3713  $where[] = $wpdb->prepare( "is_read = %d AND status = 'active'", $read );
3714  }
3715 
3716  if ( $payment_status ) {
3717  $where[] = $wpdb->prepare( "payment_status = '%s'", $payment_status );
3718  }
3719 
3720  if ( $status !== null ) {
3721  $where[] = $wpdb->prepare( 'status = %s', $status );
3722  }
3723 
3724  if ( ! empty( $start_date ) ) {
3725  $where[] = "timestampdiff(SECOND, '$start_date', date_created) >= 0";
3726  }
3727 
3728  if ( ! empty( $end_date ) ) {
3729  $where[] = "timestampdiff(SECOND, '$end_date', date_created) <= 0";
3730  }
3731 
3732  return 'WHERE ' . implode( ' AND ', $where );
3733  }

3735  public static function build_lead_array( $results, $use_long_values = true ) {
3736 
3737  $leads = array();
3738  $lead = array();
3739  $form_id = 0;
3740  if ( is_array( $results ) && sizeof( $results ) > 0 ) {
3741  $form_id = $results[0]->form_id;
3742  $lead = array( 'id' => $results[0]->id, 'form_id' => $results[0]->form_id, 'date_created' => $results[0]->date_created, 'is_starred' => intval( $results[0]->is_starred ), 'is_read' => intval( $results[0]->is_read ), 'ip' => $results[0]->ip, 'source_url' => $results[0]->source_url, 'post_id' => $results[0]->post_id, 'currency' => $results[0]->currency, 'payment_status' => $results[0]->payment_status, 'payment_date' => $results[0]->payment_date, 'transaction_id' => $results[0]->transaction_id, 'payment_amount' => $results[0]->payment_amount, 'payment_method' => $results[0]->payment_method, 'is_fulfilled' => $results[0]->is_fulfilled, 'created_by' => $results[0]->created_by, 'transaction_type' => $results[0]->transaction_type, 'user_agent' => $results[0]->user_agent, 'status' => $results[0]->status );
3743 
3744  $form = RGFormsModel::get_form_meta( $form_id );
3745  $prev_lead_id = 0;
3746  foreach ( $results as $result ) {
3747  if ( $prev_lead_id <> $result->id && $prev_lead_id > 0 ) {
3748  array_push( $leads, $lead );
3749  $lead = array( 'id' => $result->id, 'form_id' => $result->form_id, 'date_created' => $result->date_created, 'is_starred' => intval( $result->is_starred ), 'is_read' => intval( $result->is_read ), 'ip' => $result->ip, 'source_url' => $result->source_url, 'post_id' => $result->post_id, 'currency' => $result->currency, 'payment_status' => $result->payment_status, 'payment_date' => $result->payment_date, 'transaction_id' => $result->transaction_id, 'payment_amount' => $result->payment_amount, 'payment_method' => $result->payment_method, 'is_fulfilled' => $result->is_fulfilled, 'created_by' => $result->created_by, 'transaction_type' => $result->transaction_type, 'user_agent' => $result->user_agent, 'status' => $result->status );
3750  }
3751 
3752  $field_value = $result->value;
3753  $field_number = (string)$result->field_number;
3754 
3755  //using long values if specified
3756  if ( $use_long_values && strlen( $field_value ) >= ( GFORMS_MAX_FIELD_LENGTH - 10 ) ) {
3757  $long_text = RGFormsModel::get_field_value_long( $lead, $field_number, $form, false );
3758  $field_value = ! empty( $long_text ) ? $long_text : $field_value;
3759  }
3760 
3761  $lead[ $field_number ] = $field_value;
3762  $prev_lead_id = $result->id;
3763  }
3764  }
3765 
3766 
3767  //adding last lead.
3768  if ( sizeof( $lead ) > 0 ) {
3769  array_push( $leads, $lead );
3770  }
3771 
3772  //running entry through gform_get_field_value filter
3773  foreach ( $leads as &$lead ) {
3774  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
3775  /* @var GF_Field $field */
3776  $inputs = $field->get_entry_inputs();
3777  // skip types html, page and section?
3778  if ( is_array( $inputs ) ) {
3779  foreach ( $inputs as $input ) {
3780  $lead[ (string) $input['id'] ] = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_get_input_value', $form['id'], $field->id, $input['id'] ), rgar( $lead, (string) $input['id'] ), $lead, $field, $input['id'] );
3781  }
3782  } else {
3783 
3784  $value = rgar( $lead, (string) $field->id );
3785 
3786  if ( self::is_encrypted_field( $lead['id'], $field->id ) ) {
3787  $value = GFCommon::decrypt( $value );
3788  }
3789 
3790  $lead[ $field->id ] = gf_apply_filters( array( 'gform_get_input_value', $form['id'], $field->id ), $value, $lead, $field, '' );
3791 
3792  }
3793  }
3794  }
3795 
3796  //add custom entry properties
3797  $entry_ids = array();
3798  foreach ( $leads as $l ) {
3799  $entry_ids[] = $l['id'];
3800  }
3801  $entry_meta = GFFormsModel::get_entry_meta( $form_id );
3802  $meta_keys = array_keys( $entry_meta );
3803  $entry_meta_data_rows = gform_get_meta_values_for_entries( $entry_ids, $meta_keys );
3804  foreach ( $leads as &$lead ) {
3805  foreach ( $entry_meta_data_rows as $entry_meta_data_row ) {
3806  if ( $entry_meta_data_row->lead_id == $lead['id'] ) {
3807  foreach ( $meta_keys as $meta_key ) {
3808  $lead[ $meta_key ] = $entry_meta_data_row->$meta_key;
3809  }
3810  }
3811  }
3812  }
3813 
3814  return $leads;
3815  }

3818  $current_key = get_option( 'rg_gforms_key' );
3819  if ( empty( $key ) ) {
3820  delete_option( 'rg_gforms_key' );
3821  } else if ( $current_key != $key ) {
3822  $key = trim( $key );
3823  update_option( 'rg_gforms_key', md5( $key ) );
3824  }
3825  }

3878  public static function get_grid_columns( $form_id, $input_label_only = false ) {
3879  $form = self::get_form_meta( $form_id );
3880  $field_ids = self::get_grid_column_meta( $form_id );
3881 
3882  if ( ! is_array( $field_ids ) ) {
3883  $field_ids = array();
3884 
3885  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
3886  /* @var GF_Field $field */
3887 
3888  //loading post category fields with choices and inputs
3889  if ( $field->type == 'post_category' ) {
3890  $field = GFCommon::add_categories_as_choices( $field, '' );
3891  }
3892 
3893  if ( $field->displayOnly || $field->get_input_type() == 'list' ) {
3894  continue;
3895  }
3896 
3897  $inputs = $field->get_entry_inputs();
3898  if ( is_array( $inputs ) ) {
3899  if ( $field->type == 'name' ) {
3900  $field_ids[] = $field->id . '.3'; //adding first name
3901  $field_ids[] = $field->id . '.6'; //adding last name
3902  } else {
3903  $field_ids[] = $field->inputs[0]['id']; //getting first input
3904  }
3905  } else {
3906  $field_ids[] = $field->id;
3907  }
3908 
3909  if ( count( $field_ids ) >= 5 ) {
3910  break;
3911  }
3912  }
3913  //adding default entry meta columns
3914  $entry_metas = GFFormsModel::get_entry_meta( $form_id );
3915  foreach ( $entry_metas as $key => $entry_meta ) {
3916  if ( rgar( $entry_meta, 'is_default_column' ) ) {
3917  $field_ids[] = $key;
3918  }
3919  }
3920  }
3921 
3922  $columns = array();
3923  $entry_meta = self::get_entry_meta( $form_id );
3924  foreach ( $field_ids as $field_id ) {
3925 
3926  switch ( $field_id ) {
3927  case 'id' :
3928  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'Entry Id', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'id' );
3929  break;
3930  case 'ip' :
3931  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'User IP', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'ip' );
3932  break;
3933  case 'date_created' :
3934  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'Entry Date', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'date_created' );
3935  break;
3936  case 'source_url' :
3937  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'Source Url', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'source_url' );
3938  break;
3939  case 'payment_status' :
3940  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'Payment Status', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'payment_status' );
3941  break;
3942  case 'transaction_id' :
3943  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'Transaction Id', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'transaction_id' );
3944  break;
3945  case 'payment_date' :
3946  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'Payment Date', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'payment_date' );
3947  break;
3948  case 'payment_amount' :
3949  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'Payment Amount', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'payment_amount' );
3950  break;
3951  case 'created_by' :
3952  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => esc_html__( 'User', 'gravityforms' ), 'type' => 'created_by' );
3953  break;
3954  case ( ( is_string( $field_id ) || is_int( $field_id ) ) && array_key_exists( $field_id, $entry_meta ) ) :
3955  $columns[ $field_id ] = array( 'label' => $entry_meta[ $field_id ]['label'], 'type' => $field_id );
3956  break;
3957  default :
3958  $field = self::get_field( $form, $field_id );
3959  if ( $field ) {
3960  $input_label_only = apply_filters( 'gform_entry_list_column_input_label_only', $input_label_only, $form, $field );
3961  $columns[strval( $field_id )] = array( 'label' => self::get_label( $field, $field_id, $input_label_only ), 'type' => $field->type, 'inputType' => $field->inputType );
3962  }
3963  }
3964  }
3965 
3966  return $columns;
3967  }

3969  /**
3970  * @param GF_Field $field
3971  * @param int $input_id
3972  * @param bool $input_only
3973  *
3974  * @return string
3975  */
3976  public static function get_label( $field, $input_id = 0, $input_only = false, $allow_admin_label = true ) {
3977  if ( ! $field instanceof GF_Field ) {
3978  $field = GF_Fields::create( $field );
3979  }
3980  $field_label = ( IS_ADMIN || RG_CURRENT_PAGE == 'select_columns.php' || RG_CURRENT_PAGE == 'print-entry.php' || rgget( 'gf_page', $_GET ) == 'select_columns' || rgget( 'gf_page', $_GET ) == 'print-entry' ) && ! empty( $field->adminLabel ) && $allow_admin_label ? $field->adminLabel : $field->label;
3981  $input = self::get_input( $field, $input_id );
3982  if ( self::get_input_type($field) == 'checkbox' && $input != null ) {
3983  return $input['label'];
3984  } else if ( $input != null ) {
3985  return $input_only ? $input['label'] : $field_label . ' (' . $input['label'] . ')';
3986  } else {
3987  return $field_label;
3988  }
3989  }

4116  /**

4119  *
4120  * @param mixed $form
4121  * @return array
4122  */
4123  public static function convert_confirmation( $form ) {
4124 
4125  $id = uniqid();
4126

4128  $confirmation = rgar( $form, 'confirmation' );
4129  $confirmation['id'] = $id;

4131  $confirmation['isDefault'] = true;
4132

4134 
4135  self::save_form_confirmations( $form['id'], $form['confirmations'] );
4136 
4137  return $form;
4138  }

4276  private static function sort_by_field_query( $form_id, $search_criteria, $sorting, $paging ) {
4277  global $wpdb;
4278  $sort_field_number = rgar( $sorting, 'key' );
4279  $sort_direction = isset( $sorting['direction'] ) ? $sorting['direction'] : 'DESC';
4280 
4281  $is_numeric_sort = isset( $sorting['is_numeric'] ) ? $sorting['is_numeric'] : false;
4282  $offset = isset( $paging['offset'] ) ? $paging['offset'] : 0;
4283  $page_size = isset( $paging['page_size'] ) ? $paging['page_size'] : 20;
4284 
4285  if ( ! is_numeric( $sort_field_number ) || ! is_numeric( $offset ) || ! is_numeric( $page_size ) ) {
4286  return '';
4287  }
4288 
4289  $lead_detail_table_name = GFFormsModel::get_lead_details_table_name();
4290  $lead_table_name = GFFormsModel::get_lead_table_name();
4291 
4292  $sort_direction = strtolower( $sort_direction ) == 'desc' ? 'DESC' : 'ASC' ;
4293 
4294  $orderby = $is_numeric_sort ? "ORDER BY query, (value+0) $sort_direction" : "ORDER BY query, value $sort_direction";
4295 
4296  $form_id_where = self::get_form_id_where( $form_id );
4297 
4298  if ( ! empty( $form_id_where ) ) {
4299  $form_id_where = ' AND ' . $form_id_where;
4300  }
4301 
4302  $where = self::get_search_where( $form_id, $search_criteria );
4303 
4304  $field_number_min = $sort_field_number - 0.0001;
4305  $field_number_max = $sort_field_number + 0.0001;
4306 
4307  $sql = "
4308  SELECT filtered.sort, l.*, d.field_number, d.value
4309  FROM $lead_table_name l
4310  INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id
4311  INNER JOIN (
4312  SELECT distinct sorted.sort, l.id
4313  FROM $lead_table_name l
4314  INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id
4315  INNER JOIN (
4316  SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as sort, id FROM (
4317  SELECT 0 as query, lead_id as id, value
4318  FROM $lead_detail_table_name l
4319  WHERE field_number between $field_number_min AND $field_number_max
4320  $form_id_where
4321 
4322  UNION ALL
4323 
4324  SELECT 1 as query, l.id, d.value
4325  FROM $lead_table_name l
4326  LEFT OUTER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id AND field_number between $field_number_min AND $field_number_max
4327  WHERE d.lead_id IS NULL
4328  $form_id_where
4329 
4330  ) sorted1
4331  $orderby
4332  ) sorted ON d.lead_id = sorted.id
4333  $where
4334  LIMIT $offset,$page_size
4335  ) filtered ON filtered.id = l.id
4336 
4337  ORDER BY filtered.sort";
4338 
4339  return $sql;
4340  }
4341 
4342  private static function sort_by_column_query( $form_id, $search_criteria, $sorting, $paging ) {
4343  global $wpdb;
4344  $sort_field = isset( $sorting['key'] ) ? $sorting['key'] : 'date_created';
4345  $sort_direction = isset( $sorting['direction'] ) ? $sorting['direction'] : 'DESC';
4346  $is_numeric_sort = isset( $sorting['is_numeric'] ) ? $sorting['is_numeric'] : false;
4347  $offset = isset( $paging['offset'] ) ? $paging['offset'] : 0;
4348  $page_size = isset( $paging['page_size'] ) ? $paging['page_size'] : 20;
4349 
4350  if ( ! is_numeric( $offset ) || ! is_numeric( $page_size ) ) {
4351  return '';
4352  }
4353 
4354  $lead_detail_table_name = GFFormsModel::get_lead_details_table_name();
4355  $lead_table_name = GFFormsModel::get_lead_table_name();
4356  $lead_meta_table_name = GFFormsModel::get_lead_meta_table_name();
4357 
4358  $entry_meta = GFFormsModel::get_entry_meta( is_array( $form_id ) ? 0 : $form_id );
4359  $entry_meta_sql_join = '';
4360  $sort_field_is_entry_meta = false;
4361  if ( false === empty( $entry_meta ) && array_key_exists( $sort_field, $entry_meta ) ) {
4362  $entry_meta_sql_join = $wpdb->prepare(
4363  "
4364  INNER JOIN
4365  (
4366  SELECT
4367  lead_id, meta_value as $sort_field
4368  from $lead_meta_table_name
4369  WHERE meta_key=%s
4370  ) lead_meta_data ON lead_meta_data.lead_id = l.id
4371  ", $sort_field
4372  );
4373  $is_numeric_sort = $entry_meta[ $sort_field ]['is_numeric'];
4374  $sort_field_is_entry_meta = true;
4375  } else {
4376  $db_columns = self::get_lead_db_columns();
4377  if ( $sort_field != 'date_created' && false === in_array( $sort_field, $db_columns ) ) {
4378  $sort_field = 'date_created';
4379  }
4380  }
4381 
4382  if ( $sort_field_is_entry_meta ) {
4383  $orderby = $is_numeric_sort ? "ORDER BY ($sort_field+0) $sort_direction" : "ORDER BY $sort_field $sort_direction";
4384  } else {
4385  $orderby = $is_numeric_sort ? "ORDER BY (l.$sort_field+0) $sort_direction" : "ORDER BY l.$sort_field $sort_direction";
4386  }
4387 
4388  $where = self::get_search_where( $form_id, $search_criteria );
4389 
4390  $sql = "
4391  SELECT filtered.sort, l.*, d.field_number, d.value
4392  FROM $lead_table_name l
4393  INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id
4394  INNER JOIN
4395  (
4396  SELECT @rownum:=@rownum + 1 as sort, id
4397  FROM
4398  (
4399  SELECT distinct l.id
4400  FROM $lead_table_name l
4401  INNER JOIN $lead_detail_table_name d ON d.lead_id = l.id
4402  $entry_meta_sql_join
4403  $where
4404  $orderby
4405  LIMIT $offset,$page_size
4406  ) page
4407  ) filtered ON filtered.id = l.id
4408 
4409  ORDER BY filtered.sort";
4410 
4411  return $sql;
4412  }

4414  private static function get_form_id_where( $form_id ) {

4418  $in_str_arr = array_fill( 0, count( $form_id ), '%d' );
4419  $in_str = join( ',', $in_str_arr );
4420  $form_id_where = $wpdb->prepare( "l.form_id IN ($in_str)", $form_id );
4421  } else {
4422  $form_id_where = $form_id > 0 ? $wpdb->prepare( 'l.form_id=%d', $form_id ) : '';

4427 
4428  private static function get_search_where( $form_id, $search_criteria ) {
4429 
4430  global $wpdb;
4431 
4432  $where_arr = array();
4433 
4434  $field_filters_where = self::get_field_filters_where( $form_id, $search_criteria );
4435  if ( ! empty( $field_filters_where ) ) {
4436  $where_arr[] = $field_filters_where;
4437  }
4438 
4439  $info_search_where = self::get_info_search_where( $search_criteria );
4440 
4441  if ( ! empty( $info_search_where ) ) {
4442  $where_arr[] = $info_search_where;
4443  }
4444 
4445  $search_operator = self::get_search_operator( $search_criteria );
4446  $where = empty( $where_arr ) ? '' : '(' . join( " $search_operator ", $where_arr ) . ')';
4447 
4448  $date_range_where = self::get_date_range_where( $search_criteria );
4449 
4450  $where_and_clause_arr = array();
4451  if ( ! empty( $date_range_where ) ) {
4452  $where_and_clause_arr[] = $date_range_where;
4453  }
4454 
4455  $form_id_where = self::get_form_id_where( $form_id );
4456 
4457  if ( ! empty( $form_id_where ) ) {
4458  $where_and_clause_arr[] = $form_id_where;
4459  }
4460 
4461  $status_where = isset( $search_criteria['status'] ) ? $wpdb->prepare( 'l.status = %s', $search_criteria['status'] ) : '';
4462  if ( ! empty( $status_where ) ) {
4463  $where_and_clause_arr[] = $status_where;
4464  }
4465 
4466  $where_and_clause = join( ' AND ', $where_and_clause_arr );
4467 
4468  if ( ! empty( $where_and_clause ) ) {
4469  $where_and_clause = '(' . $where_and_clause . ')';
4470  }
4471 
4472  $where_parts = array();
4473  if ( ! empty( $where ) ) {
4474  $where_parts[] = $where;
4475  }
4476  if ( ! empty( $where_and_clause ) ) {
4477  $where_parts[] = $where_and_clause;
4478  }
4479 
4480  $where = join( ' AND ', $where_parts );
4481 
4482  if ( ! empty( $where ) ) {
4483  $where = 'WHERE ' . $where;
4484  }
4485 
4486  return $where;
4487  }
4488 
4489  private static function get_field_filters_where( $form_id, $search_criteria ) {
4490  global $wpdb;
4491 
4492  $field_filters = rgar( $search_criteria, 'field_filters' );
4493 
4494  $search_operator = self::get_search_operator( $search_criteria );
4495 
4496  if ( empty( $field_filters ) ) {
4497  return false;
4498  }
4499 
4500  unset( $field_filters['mode'] );
4501 
4502  $sql_array = array();
4503  $lead_details_table_name = GFFormsModel::get_lead_details_table_name();
4504  $lead_meta_table_name = GFFormsModel::get_lead_meta_table_name();
4505  if ( is_array( $form_id ) ) {
4506  $in_str_arr = array_fill( 0, count( $form_id ), '%d' );
4507  $in_str = join( ',', $in_str_arr );
4508  $form_id_where = $wpdb->prepare( "AND form_id IN ($in_str)", $form_id );
4509  } else {
4510  $form_id_where = $form_id > 0 ? $wpdb->prepare( 'AND form_id=%d', $form_id ) : '';
4511  }
4512  $info_column_keys = self::get_lead_db_columns();
4513  $entry_meta = self::get_entry_meta( is_array( $form_id ) ? 0 : $form_id );
4514  array_push( $info_column_keys, 'id' );
4515  foreach ( $field_filters as $search ) {
4516 
4517  $key = rgar( $search, 'key' );
4518  if ( 'entry_id' === $key ) {
4519  $key = 'id';
4520  }
4521  if ( in_array( $key, $info_column_keys ) ) {
4522  continue;
4523  }
4524 
4525  $val = rgar( $search, 'value' );
4526 
4527  $operator = self::is_valid_operator( rgar( $search, 'operator' ) ) ? strtolower( $search['operator'] ) : '=';
4528 
4529  if ( 'is' == $operator ) {
4530  $operator = '=';
4531  }
4532  if ( 'isnot' == $operator ) {
4533  $operator = '<>';
4534  }
4535  if ( 'contains' == $operator ) {
4536  $operator = 'like';
4537  }
4538 
4539  $search_term = 'like' == $operator ? "%$val%" : $val;
4540 
4541  $search_type = rgar( $search, 'type' );
4542  if ( empty( $search_type ) ) {
4543  if ( empty( $key ) ) {
4544  $search_type = 'global';
4545  } elseif ( is_numeric( $key ) ) {
4546  $search_type = 'field';
4547  } else {
4548  $search_type = 'meta';
4549  }
4550  }
4551 
4552  switch ( $search_type ) {
4553  case 'field':
4554  $is_number_field = false;
4555  if ( $operator != 'like' && ! is_array( $form_id ) && $form_id > 0 ) {
4556  $form = GFAPI::get_form( $form_id );
4557  $field = self::get_field( $form, $key );
4558  if ( self::get_input_type( $field ) == 'number' ){
4559  $is_number_field = true;
4560  }
4561  }
4562 
4563  $search_term_placeholder = rgar( $search, 'is_numeric' ) || $is_number_field ? '%f' : '%s';
4564 
4565  if ( is_array( $search_term ) ) {
4566  if ( in_array( $operator, array( '=', 'in' ) ) ) {
4567  $operator = 'IN'; // Override operator
4568  } elseif ( in_array( $operator, array( '!=', '<>', 'not in' ) ) ) {
4569  $operator = 'NOT IN'; // Override operator
4570  }
4571  // Format in SQL and sanitize the strings in the list
4572  $search_terms = array_fill( 0, count( $search_term ), '%s' );
4573  $search_term_placeholder = $wpdb->prepare( '( ' . implode( ', ', $search_terms ) . ' )', $search_term );
4574  $search_term = ''; // Set to blank, still gets passed to wpdb::prepare below but isn't used
4575  }
4576 
4577  $upper_field_number_limit = (string) (int) $key === $key ? (float) $key + 0.9999 : (float) $key + 0.0001;
4578  /* doesn't support "<>" for checkboxes */
4579  $field_query = $wpdb->prepare(
4580  "
4581  l.id IN
4582  (
4583  SELECT
4584  lead_id
4585  from {$lead_details_table_name}
4586  WHERE (field_number BETWEEN %s AND %s AND value {$operator} {$search_term_placeholder})
4587  {$form_id_where}
4588  )", (float) $key - 0.0001, $upper_field_number_limit, $search_term
4589  );
4590 
4591 
4592  if ( ( empty( $val ) && $operator != '<>' ) || $val === '%%' || ( $operator === '<>' && ! empty( $val ) ) ) {
4593  $skipped_field_query = $wpdb->prepare(
4594  "
4595  l.id NOT IN
4596  (
4597  SELECT
4598  lead_id
4599  from {$lead_details_table_name}
4600  WHERE (field_number BETWEEN %s AND %s)
4601  {$form_id_where}
4602  )", (float) $key - 0.0001, $upper_field_number_limit, $search_term
4603  );
4604  $field_query = '(' . $field_query . ' OR ' . $skipped_field_query . ')';
4605  }
4606

4608 
4609  /*

4611  $sql_array[] = $wpdb->prepare("l.id IN
4612  (SELECT lead_id
4613  FROM
4614  (
4615  SELECT lead_id, value
4616  FROM $lead_details_table_name
4617  WHERE form_id = %d
4618  AND (field_number BETWEEN %s AND %s)
4619  GROUP BY lead_id
4620  HAVING value $operator %s
4621  ) ld
4622  )
4623  ", $form_id, (float)$key - 0.0001, $upper_field_number_limit, $val );
4624  */
4625  break;
4626  case 'global':
4627 
4628  // include choice text
4629  $forms = array();
4630  if ( $form_id == 0 ) {
4631  $forms = GFAPI::get_forms();
4632  } elseif ( is_array( $form_id ) ) {
4633  foreach ( $form_id as $id ){
4634  $forms[] = GFAPI::get_form( $id );
4635  }
4636  } else {
4637  $forms[] = GFAPI::get_form( $form_id );
4638  }
4639 
4640  $choice_texts_clauses = array();
4641  foreach ( $forms as $form ) {
4642  if ( isset( $form['fields'] ) ) {
4643  $choice_texts_clauses_for_form = array();
4644  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
4645  /* @var GF_Field $field */
4646  $choice_texts_clauses_for_field = array();
4647  if ( is_array( $field->choices ) ) {
4648  foreach ( $field->choices as $choice ) {
4649  if ( ( $operator == '=' && strtolower( $choice['text'] ) == strtolower( $val ) ) || ( $operator == 'like' && ! empty( $val ) && strpos( strtolower( $choice['text'] ), strtolower( $val ) ) !== false ) ) {
4650  if ( $field->gsurveyLikertEnableMultipleRows ){
4651  $choice_value = '%' . $choice['value'] . '%' ;
4652  $choice_search_operator = 'like';
4653  } else {
4654  $choice_value = $choice['value'];
4655  $choice_search_operator = '=';
4656  }
4657  $choice_texts_clauses_for_field[] = $wpdb->prepare( "(field_number BETWEEN %s AND %s AND value {$choice_search_operator} %s)", (float) $field->id - 0.0001, (float) $field->id + 0.9999, $choice_value );
4658  }
4659  }
4660  }
4661  if ( ! empty( $choice_texts_clauses_for_field ) ) {
4662  $choice_texts_clauses_for_form[] = join( ' OR ', $choice_texts_clauses_for_field );
4663  }
4664  }
4665  }
4666  if ( ! empty( $choice_texts_clauses_for_form ) ) {
4667  $choice_texts_clauses[] = '(l.form_id = ' . $form['id'] . ' AND (' . join( ' OR ', $choice_texts_clauses_for_form ) . ' ))';
4668  }
4669  }
4670  $choice_texts_clause = '';
4671  if ( ! empty( $choice_texts_clauses) ){
4672  $choice_texts_clause = join( ' OR ', $choice_texts_clauses );
4673  $choice_texts_clause = "

4676  lead_id
4677  FROM {$lead_details_table_name}
4678  WHERE {$choice_texts_clause} ) OR ";
4679  }
4680  $choice_value_clause = $wpdb->prepare( "value {$operator} %s", $search_term );
4681  $sql_array[] = '(' . $choice_texts_clause . $choice_value_clause . ')';
4682  break;
4683  case 'meta':
4684  /* doesn't support '<>' for multiple values of the same key */
4685 
4686  $meta = rgar( $entry_meta, $key );
4687  $placeholder = rgar( $meta, 'is_numeric' ) ? '%s' : '%s';
4688  $search_term = 'like' == $operator ? "%$val%" : $val;
4689 
4690  if ( is_array( $search_term ) ) {
4691  if ( in_array( $operator, array( '=', 'in' ) ) ) {
4692  $operator = 'IN';
4693  } elseif ( in_array( $operator, array( '!=', '<>', 'not in' ) ) ) {
4694  $operator = 'NOT IN';
4695  }
4696  $search_terms = array_fill( 0, count( $search_term ), '%s' );

4698 
4699  $search_term = '';
4700  }

4702  $sql_array[] = $wpdb->prepare(
4703  "

4712  );

4714 
4715  }

4723  private static function get_date_range_where( $search_criteria ) {
4724  global $wpdb;
4725 
4726  if ( isset( $search_criteria['start_date'] ) ) {
4727  $where_array[] = $wpdb->prepare( 'date_created >= %s', $search_criteria['start_date'] );
4728  }
4729 
4730  if ( isset( $search_criteria['end_date'] ) ) {
4731 
4732  $end_date = new DateTime( $search_criteria['end_date'] );
4733  $end_datetime_str = $end_date->format( 'Y-m-d H:i:s' );
4734  $end_date_str = $end_date->format( 'Y-m-d' );
4735 
4736  // extend end date till the end of the day unless a time was specified. 00:00:00 is ignored.
4737  if ( $end_datetime_str == $end_date_str . ' 00:00:00' ) {
4738  $end_date = $end_date->format( 'Y-m-d' ) . ' 23:59:59';
4739  } else {
4740  $end_date = $end_date->format( 'Y-m-d H:i:s' );
4741  }
4742 
4743  $where_array[] = $wpdb->prepare( 'date_created <= %s', $end_date );
4744  }
4745 
4746 
4747  $sql = empty( $where_array ) ? '' : '(' . join( ' AND ', $where_array ) . ')';
4748 
4749  return $sql;
4750  }

4903  /**
4904  * Trims values inside choice texts, choice values, input labels, field labels and field conditionalLogic
4905  *
4906  * @param array $form Form object.
4907  * @param bool $form_updated Output parameter.
4908  *
4909  * @return array $form
4910  */
4911  public static function trim_form_meta_values( $form, &$form_updated = false ) {
4912  $form_id = $form['id'];
4913  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::trim_form_meta_values(): Starting.' );
4914  if ( isset( $form['fields'] ) && is_array( $form['fields'] ) ) {
4915  foreach ( $form['fields'] as &$field ) {
4916  $trim_value = apply_filters( 'gform_trim_input_value', true, $form_id, $field );
4917  if ( ! $trim_value ) {
4918  continue;
4919  }
4920 
4921 
4922 
4923  if ( isset( $field->label ) && $field->label != trim( $field->label ) ) {
4924  $field->label = trim( $field->label );
4925  $form_updated = true;
4926  }
4927  if ( is_array( $field->choices ) ) {
4928  foreach ( $field->choices as &$choice ) {
4929  if ( isset( $choice['text'] ) && $choice['text'] != trim( $choice['text'] ) ) {
4930  $choice['text'] = trim( $choice['text'] );
4931  $form_updated = true;
4932  }
4933  if ( isset( $choice['value'] ) && $choice['value'] != trim( $choice['value'] ) ) {
4934  $choice['value'] = trim( $choice['value'] );
4935  $form_updated = true;
4936  }
4937  }
4938  }
4939  if ( is_array( $field->inputs ) ) {
4940  foreach ( $field->inputs as &$input ) {
4941  if ( isset( $input['label'] ) && $input['label'] != trim( $input['label'] ) ) {
4942  $input['label'] = trim( $input['label'] );
4943  $form_updated = true;
4944  }
4945  }
4946  }
4947  }
4948  $form['fields'] = GFFormsModel::trim_conditional_logic_values( $form['fields'], $form, $form_updated );
4949  }
4950  if ( $form_updated ) {
4951  GFCommon::log_debug( 'GFFormsModel::trim_form_meta_values(): Form values trimmed.' );
4952  }
4953 
4954  return $form;
4955  }

4957  /**
4958  * Trims values from an array of elements e.g. notifications and confirmations
4959  *

4962  * @param bool $updated Output parameter.
4963  *

4966  public static function trim_conditional_logic_values( $meta_array, $form, &$updated = false ) {

4968  if ( is_array( $meta_array ) ) {

4971  }

4980  /**
4981  * Trims values from elements e.g. fields, notifications and confirmations
4982  *
4983  * @param array $element Form object.
4984  * @param array $form Form object.
4985  * @param bool $updated Output parameter.
4986  *
4987  * @return array $element
4988  */
4989  public static function trim_conditional_logic_values_from_element( $element, $form = array(), &$updated = false ) {
4990  if ( $element instanceof GF_Field ) {
4991 
4992  /* @var GF_Field $element */
4993  if ( is_array( $element->conditionalLogic ) && isset( $element->conditionalLogic['rules'] ) && is_array( $element->conditionalLogic['rules'] ) ) {
4994  foreach ( $element->conditionalLogic['rules'] as &$rule ) {
4995  $value = (string) $rule['value'];
4996  if ( $value !== trim( $value ) ) {

4998  $trim_value = apply_filters( 'gform_trim_input_value', true, rgar( $form, 'id' ), $field );
4999  if ( $trim_value ) {
5000  $rule['value'] = trim( $rule['value'] );
5001  $updated = true;
5002  }
5003  }
5004  }
5005  }
5006  } else {
5007  if ( isset( $element['conditionalLogic'] ) && is_array( $element['conditionalLogic'] ) && isset( $element['conditionalLogic']['rules'] ) && is_array( $element['conditionalLogic']['rules'] ) ) {
5008  foreach ( $element['conditionalLogic']['rules'] as &$rule ) {
5009  $value = (string) $rule['value'];
5010  if ( $value !== trim( $value ) ) {
5011  $field = isset( $form['fields'] ) ? GFFormsModel::get_field( $form, $rule['fieldId'] ) : array();
5012  $trim_value = apply_filters( 'gform_trim_input_value', true, rgar( $form, 'id' ), $field );
5013  if ( $trim_value ) {
5014  $rule['value'] = trim( $rule['value'] );
5015  $updated = true;
5016  }
5017  }
5018  }
5019  }
5020  }
5021 
5022  return $element;

5051  public static function is_encrypted_field( $entry_id, $field_id ) {
5052 
5053  /**
5054  * Determines if an entry field is stored encrypted. Use this hook to change the default behavior of decrypting fields that have been encrypted or to completely disable the
5055  * process if checking for encrypted fields.
5056  *
5057  * @param int $entry_id The current Entry ID
5058  * @param int $field_id The current Field ID.
5059  */
5060  $is_encrypted = apply_filters('gform_is_encrypted_field', '', $entry_id, $field_id );
5061  if ( $is_encrypted !== '' ){
5062  return $is_encrypted;
5063  }
5064 
5065  $encrypted_fields = self::get_encrypted_fields( $entry_id );
5066 
5067  return in_array( $field_id, $encrypted_fields );
5068  }

5074  $entry[ $password_field->id ] = '';
5075  }
5076  }
5077  GFAPI::update_entry( $entry );
5078 
5079  return $entry;
5080  }

5088 
5089  public static function sanitize_settings( $form ) {
5090 
5091  $form['version'] = GFForms::$version;
5092 
5093  if ( apply_filters( 'gform_disable_form_settings_sanitization', false ) ) {
5094  return $form;
5095  }
5096 
5097  // -- standard form settings --
5098 
5099  $allowed_tags = wp_kses_allowed_html( 'post' );
5100 
5101  $form['title'] = sanitize_text_field( rgar( $form, 'title' ) );
5102  if ( isset ( $form['description'] ) ) {
5103  $form['description'] = wp_kses( $form['description'], $allowed_tags );
5104  }
5105 
5106  if ( isset ( $form['labelPlacement'] ) ) {
5107  $form['labelPlacement'] = GFCommon::whitelist( $form['labelPlacement'], array( 'top_label', 'left_label', 'right_label' ) );
5108  }
5109  if ( isset ( $form['descriptionPlacement'] ) ) {
5110  $form['descriptionPlacement'] = GFCommon::whitelist( $form['descriptionPlacement'], array( 'below', 'above' ) );
5111  }
5112 
5113  if ( isset ( $form['subLabelPlacement'] ) ) {
5114  $form['subLabelPlacement'] = GFCommon::whitelist( $form['subLabelPlacement'], array( 'below', 'above' ) );
5115  }
5116 
5117  // -- advanced form settings --
5118 
5119  if ( isset ( $form['cssClass'] ) ) {
5120  $form['cssClass'] = sanitize_text_field( $form['cssClass'] );
5121  }
5122 
5123  if ( isset ( $form['enableHoneypot'] ) ) {
5124  $form['enableHoneypot'] = (bool) $form['enableHoneypot'];
5125  }
5126 
5127  if ( isset ( $form['enableAnimation'] ) ) {
5128  $form['enableAnimation'] = (bool) $form['enableAnimation'];
5129  }
5130 
5131  // form button settings
5132  if ( isset ( $form['button'] ) ) {
5133  $form['button']['type'] = GFCommon::whitelist( $form['button']['type'], array( 'text', 'image' ) );
5134  $form['button']['text'] = $form['button']['type'] == 'text' ? sanitize_text_field( $form['button']['text'] ) : '';
5135  $form['button']['imageUrl'] = $form['button']['type'] == 'image' ? sanitize_text_field( $form['button']['imageUrl'] ) : '';
5136  }
5137  if ( isset( $form['button']['conditionalLogic'] ) ) {
5138  $form['button']['conditionalLogic'] = self::sanitize_conditional_logic( $form['button']['conditionalLogic'] );
5139  }
5140 
5141  // Save and Continue settings
5142  if ( isset ( $form['save'] ) ) {
5143  $form['save']['enabled'] = (bool) $form['save']['enabled'] ;
5144  $form['save']['button']['type'] = 'link';
5145  $form['save']['button']['text'] = sanitize_text_field( $form['save']['button']['text'] );
5146  }
5147 
5148 
5149  // limit entries settings
5150  if ( isset ( $form['limitEntries'] ) ) {
5151  $form['limitEntries'] = (bool) $form['limitEntries'];
5152  $form['limitEntriesCount'] = $form['limitEntries'] ? absint( $form['limitEntriesCount'] ) : '';
5153  $form['limitEntriesPeriod'] = $form['limitEntries'] ? GFCommon::whitelist( $form['limitEntriesPeriod'], array( '', 'day', 'week', 'month', 'year' ) ) : '';
5154  $form['limitEntriesMessage'] = $form['limitEntries'] ? wp_kses( $form['limitEntriesMessage'], $allowed_tags ) : '';
5155  }
5156 
5157  // form scheduling settings
5158  if ( isset ( $form['scheduleForm'] ) ) {
5159  $form['scheduleForm'] = (bool) $form['scheduleForm'];
5160  $form['scheduleStart'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? preg_replace( '([^0-9/])', '', $form['scheduleStart'] ) : '';
5161  $form['scheduleStartHour'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? GFCommon::int_range( $form['scheduleStartHour'], 1, 12 ) : '';
5162  $form['scheduleStartMinute'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? GFCommon::int_range( $form['scheduleStartMinute'], 1, 60 ) : '';
5163  $form['scheduleStartAmpm'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? GFCommon::whitelist( $form['scheduleStartAmpm'], array( 'am', 'pm' ) ) : '';
5164  $form['scheduleEnd'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? preg_replace( '([^0-9/])', '', $form['scheduleEnd'] ) : '';
5165  $form['scheduleEndHour'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? GFCommon::int_range( $form['scheduleEndHour'], 1, 12 ) : '';
5166  $form['scheduleEndMinute'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? GFCommon::int_range( $form['scheduleEndMinute'], 1, 60 ) : '';
5167  $form['scheduleEndAmpm'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? GFCommon::whitelist( $form['scheduleEndAmpm'], array( 'am', 'pm' ) ) : '';
5168  $form['schedulePendingMessage'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? wp_kses( $form['schedulePendingMessage'], $allowed_tags ) : '';
5169  $form['scheduleMessage'] = $form['scheduleForm'] ? wp_kses( $form['scheduleMessage'], $allowed_tags ) : '';
5170 
5171  }
5172 
5173  // require login settings
5174  if ( isset ( $form['requireLogin'] ) ) {
5175  $form['requireLogin'] = (bool) $form['requireLogin'];
5176  $form['requireLoginMessage'] = $form['requireLogin'] ? wp_kses( $form['requireLoginMessage'], $allowed_tags ) : '';
5177  }
5178 
5179 
5180  if ( isset ( $form['fields'] ) ) {
5181  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
5182  /* @var GF_Field $field */
5183  $field->sanitize_settings();
5184  }
5185  }
5186 
5187  return $form;
5188  }
5189 
5190  public static function sanitize_conditional_logic( $logic ) {
5191  if ( ! is_array( $logic ) ) {
5192  return $logic;
5193  }
5194 
5195  if ( apply_filters( 'gform_disable_form_settings_sanitization', false ) ) {
5196  return $logic;
5197  }
5198 
5199  if ( isset( $logic['actionType'] ) && ! in_array( $logic['actionType'], array( 'show', 'hide' ) ) ) {
5200  $logic['actionType'] = 'show';
5201  }
5202  if ( isset( $logic['logicType'] ) && ! in_array( $logic['logicType'], array( 'all', 'any' ) ) ) {
5203  $logic['logicType'] = 'all';
5204  }
5205 
5206  if ( isset( $logic['rules'] ) && is_array( $logic['rules'] ) ) {
5207  foreach ( $logic['rules'] as &$rule ) {
5208  if ( isset( $rule['fieldId'] ) ) {
5209  // Field ID could be meta key
5210  $rule['fieldId'] = wp_strip_all_tags( $rule['fieldId'] );
5211  }
5212  if ( isset( $rule['operator'] ) ) {
5213  $is_valid_operator = self::is_valid_operator( $rule['operator'] );
5214  $rule['operator'] = $is_valid_operator ? $rule['operator'] : 'is';
5215  }
5216 
5217  if ( isset( $rule['value'] ) ) {
5218  $rule['value'] = wp_strip_all_tags( $rule['value'] );
5219  }
5220  }
5221  }
5222  return $logic;
5223  }
5224 
5225  /**
5226  * Returns an array containing the form fields of the specified type or types.
5227  *
5228  * @since 1.9.9.10
5229  * @param array $form
5230  * @param array|string $types
5231  * @param bool $use_input_type
5232  *
5233  * @return GF_Field[]
5234  */
5235  public static function get_fields_by_type( $form, $types, $use_input_type = false ) {
5236  $fields = array();
5237  if ( ! is_array( rgar( $form, 'fields' ) ) ) {
5238  return $fields;
5239  }
5240 
5241  if ( ! is_array( $types ) ) {
5242  $types = array( $types );
5243  }
5244 
5245  foreach ( $form['fields'] as $field ) {
5246  /* @var GF_Field $field */
5247  $type = $use_input_type ? $field->get_input_type() : $field->type;
5248  if ( in_array( $type, $types ) ) {
5249  $fields[] = $field;
5250  }
5251  }
5252 
5253  return $fields;
5254  }
5255 
5256  public static function is_valid_operator( $operator ) {
5257  return in_array( strtolower( $operator ) , array( 'is', 'isnot', '<>', 'not in', 'in', '>', '<', 'contains', 'starts_with', 'ends_with', 'like', '>=' ) );
5258  }
5259 }

5264 global $_gform_lead_meta;
5265 $_gform_lead_meta = array();

5267 //functions to handle lead meta
5268 function gform_get_meta( $entry_id, $meta_key ) {
5269  global $wpdb, $_gform_lead_meta;
5270 
5271  //get from cache if available
5272  $cache_key = $entry_id . '_' . $meta_key;
5273  if ( array_key_exists( $cache_key, $_gform_lead_meta ) ) {
5274  return maybe_unserialize( $_gform_lead_meta[ $cache_key ] );
5275  }
5276 
5277  $table_name = RGFormsModel::get_lead_meta_table_name();
5278  $results = $wpdb->get_results( $wpdb->prepare( "SELECT meta_value FROM {$table_name} WHERE lead_id=%d AND meta_key=%s", $entry_id, $meta_key ) );
5279  $value = isset( $results[0] ) ? $results[0]->meta_value : null;
5280  $meta_value = $value === null ? false : maybe_unserialize( $value );
5281  $_gform_lead_meta[ $cache_key ] = $meta_value;
5282 
5283  return $meta_value;
5284 }
5285 
5286 function gform_get_meta_values_for_entries( $entry_ids, $meta_keys ) {
5287  global $wpdb;
5288 
5289  if ( empty( $meta_keys ) || empty( $entry_ids ) ) {
5290  return array();
5291  }
5292 
5293  $table_name = RGFormsModel::get_lead_meta_table_name();
5294  $meta_key_select_array = array();
5295 
5296  foreach ( $meta_keys as $meta_key ) {
5297  $meta_key_select_array[] = "max(case when meta_key = '$meta_key' then meta_value end) as $meta_key";
5298  }
5299 
5300  $entry_ids_str = join( ',', $entry_ids );
5301 
5302  $meta_key_select = join( ',', $meta_key_select_array );
5303 
5304  $sql_query = " SELECT
5305  lead_id, $meta_key_select
5306  FROM $table_name
5307  WHERE lead_id IN ($entry_ids_str)
5308  GROUP BY lead_id";
5309 
5310  $results = $wpdb->get_results( $sql_query );
5311 
5312  foreach ( $results as $result ) {
5313  foreach ( $meta_keys as $meta_key ) {
5314  $result->$meta_key = $result->$meta_key === null ? false : maybe_unserialize( $result->$meta_key );
5315  }
5316  }
5317 
5318  $meta_value_array = $results;
5319 
5320  return $meta_value_array;
5321 }

5324 /**
5325  * Add or update metadata associated with an entry
5326  *
5327  * Data will be serialized. Don't forget to sanitize user input.
5328  *
5329  * @param int $entry_id The ID of the entry to be updated
5330  * @param string $meta_key The key for the meta data to be stored
5331  * @param mixed $meta_value The data to be stored for the entry
5332  * @param int|null $form_id The form ID of the entry (optional, saves extra query if passed when creating the metadata)
5333  */
5334 function gform_update_meta( $entry_id, $meta_key, $meta_value, $form_id = null ) {
5335  global $wpdb, $_gform_lead_meta;
5336  $table_name = RGFormsModel::get_lead_meta_table_name();
5337  if ( false === $meta_value ) {
5338  $meta_value = '0';
5339  }
5340  $serialized_meta_value = maybe_serialize( $meta_value );
5341  $meta_exists = gform_get_meta( $entry_id, $meta_key ) !== false;
5342  if ( $meta_exists ) {
5343  $wpdb->update( $table_name, array( 'meta_value' => $serialized_meta_value ), array( 'lead_id' => $entry_id, 'meta_key' => $meta_key ), array( '%s' ), array( '%d', '%s' ) );
5344  } else {
5345 
5346  if ( empty( $form_id ) ) {
5347  $lead_table_name = RGFormsModel::get_lead_table_name();
5348  $form_id = $wpdb->get_var( $wpdb->prepare( "SELECT form_id from $lead_table_name WHERE id=%d", $entry_id ) );
5349  } else {
5350  $form_id = intval( $form_id );
5351  }
5352 
5353  $wpdb->insert( $table_name, array( 'form_id' => $form_id, 'lead_id' => $entry_id, 'meta_key' => $meta_key, 'meta_value' => $serialized_meta_value ), array( '%d', '%d', '%s', '%s' ) );
5354  }
5355 
5356  //updates cache
5357  $cache_key = $entry_id . '_' . $meta_key;
5358  if ( array_key_exists( $cache_key, $_gform_lead_meta ) ) {
5359  $_gform_lead_meta[ $cache_key ] = $meta_value;
5360  }
5361 }
